programme.title: Fórmula 1 - Gran Premio de São Paulo, ...
programme.desc: Vive las carreras de la 75º temporada del Campeonato Mundial de Fórmula 1 de la historia. Es organizada por la Federación Internacional del Automóvil.

programme.title: Unforgiven (1992)
programme.desc: In this thrilling and provocative revisionist Western, a former gunslinger-turned-farmer agrees to help hunt down two cowboys who assaulted and disfigured a prostitute. However, his quest brings him into conflict with an authoritarian sheriff.

programme.title: Gladiator (2000)
programme.desc: An exhilarating epic about a Roman general who becomes an enslaved gladiator after he refuses to pledge loyalty to the emperors power-hungry son.

programme.title: The Dead Dont Hurt (2023)
programme.desc: In the 1860s western frontier, the fiercely independent Vivienne Le Coudy joins her lover Holger Olsen in Elk Flats, Nevada. But the Civil War tears them apart, leaving Vivienne to fight corrupt Mayor Schiller and his ruthless partner. When Holger returns, they must confront their changed selves amidst a landscape of love, betrayal, and the struggle for justice.

programme.title: The Hateful Eight (2015)
programme.desc: A bounty hunter and his captured fugitive seek refuge from a blizzard in a mountain cabin along with six other distrustful travellers.

programme.title: True Grit (2010)
programme.desc: An alcoholic US Marshal and a 14-year-old girl track down her fathers killer with the help of a Texas Ranger. As the three brave dangerous American Indian territory, they discover their prey has fallen in with a more-experienced criminal.

programme.title: Coneheads (1993)
programme.desc: Dan Aykroyd and Jane Curtin reprise their "Saturday Night Live" roles as an alien couple who settle in New Jersey. The story concerns Beldar and Prymaat, who leave the planet Remulak to prepare for an invasion of Earth. But due to a malfunction, they find themselves plunged into the Hudson River and forced to take up residence in Paramus, N.J.

programme.title: Superstar (1999)
programme.desc: A mildly hyperactive Catholic schoolgirl tries to find fame as a movie star in order to get the boy she likes to kiss her. This outrageous comedy is based on a recurring sketch from "Saturday Night Live."

programme.title: A Night at the Roxbury (1998)
programme.desc: Terminally uncool club-hopping brothers Doug and Steve Butabi---first seen strutting their head-bobbing stuff on "Saturday Night Live"---struggle to make it through the doors of the elite Roxbury Club and hobnob with "hotties." Chris Kattan, Will Ferrell, Dan Hedaya, Loni Anderson, Molly Shannon, Colin Quinn, Gigi Rice, Elisa Donovan, Meredith Scott Lynn, Jennifer Coolidge.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting (1997)
programme.desc: An Oscar-winning screenplay by co-stars Matt Damon and Ben Affleck propels this tale about a brilliant but undisciplined cleaner who confronts his problems with the help of a therapist

programme.title: Looper (2012)
programme.desc: Time travel and the mob send a hired gun running for his life when he must kill an older version of himself in order to prevent an underworld bloodbath.

programme.title: Shooter (2007)
programme.desc: An ex-Marine sniper is recruited for a special operation and finds himself involved in a presidential assassination attempt.

programme.title: Heat (1995)
programme.desc: Tale of good versus evil as a detective obsessively tracks an expert thief. The memorable "cafe scene" marks the first time Pacino and De Niro have appeared on-screen together.

programme.title: Bad Behaviour (2023)
programme.desc: When a former child actor tries to reconnect with her daughter, she is led to a spiritual enlightenment retreat. Their relationship is very complicated, and they put all of their trust in a guru and experimental ideas to try and bring them back together.

programme.title: Last Man Standing (1996)
programme.desc: A lone stranger takes on two factions of rival bootleggers in a desolate 1930s frontier town, pitting both sides against each other and profiting from the chaotic results. Bruce Willis, Bruce Dern, Christopher Walken, Michael Imperioli, David Patrick Kelly, Alexandra Powers, Karina Lombard, Leslie Mann, Ned Eisenberg, Ken Jenkins, R.D. Call, Ted Markland, Patrick Kilpatrick, Luis Contreras.

programme.title: Looper (2012)
programme.desc: Time travel and the mob send a hired gun running for his life when he must kill an older version of himself in order to prevent an underworld bloodbath.

programme.title: Michael Clayton (2007)
programme.desc: A burned-out "fixer" at a powerful corporate law firm in New York City who faces a crisis of conscience.

programme.title: Shooter (2007)
programme.desc: An ex-Marine sniper is recruited for a special operation and finds himself involved in a presidential assassination attempt.

programme.title: The Hurt Locker (2008)
programme.desc: Jeremy Renner heads the cast of this Oscar-winning war drama about a trio of soldiers who specialise in dismantling improvised explosive devices in Baghdad. These three members of the Explosive Ordnance Disposal squad must put their fear and their personal beefs aside to keep themselves from going to "the hurt locker", the nickname soldiers have for where you recuperate after being injured in an explosion.

programme.title: Friday Night Lights (2004)
programme.desc: From one of the best sports books ever written comes a compelling, fact-based chronicle of a high-school football team in West Texas. There, winning isnt everything, its the only thing. Billy Bob Thornton stars as the coach, and country-music star Tim McGraw plays the abusive father of a player. The film was directed and co-written by Peter Berg, who adapted his cousin H.G. Bissingers bestseller.

programme.title: Vantage Point (2008)
programme.desc: In this riveting thriller, an assassination attempt is made on the president in front of a crowd, but no two witnesses can agree on who did what to whom. A Secret Service agent (Dennis Quaid) must race against time to uncover the shocking truth before the conspirators escape. Matthew Fox, Sigourney Weaver, Forest Whitaker, William Hurt.

programme.title: Monstrous (2022)
programme.desc: Laura, the mother to seven-year-old Cody, decides to get a new but isolated house near a lake. They are trying to live a new life after escaping Lauras abusive ex-husband. Amidst the appeal of their life and surroundings, a new challenge appears in the form of a monstrous being that emerges from the waters near their property, haunting them in more ways than one.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers (2002)
programme.desc: The first major battle of the Vietnam War in 1965, and the soldiers who were involved, are depicted in this drama.

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds (2009)
programme.desc: An American military officer leads a special squad of soldiers who perform quick strikes against the Nazis in enemy territory. They team up with a French theatre owner whose parents were killed by the Third Reich in a plot to execute Hitler and his right-hand men at a screening at the theatre.

programme.title: Goodfellas (1990)
programme.desc: Director Martin Scorseses riveting real-life study of New York mob life.

programme.title: Noah (2014)
programme.desc: Noah receives a warning from God about a great flood, and constructs an ark to save creation as the planet is cleansed of sin. When the rain begins to fall, Noah and his family are forced to defend their massive vessel from malicious invaders.

programme.title: Gladiator (2000)
programme.desc: An exhilarating epic about a Roman general who becomes an enslaved gladiator after he refuses to pledge loyalty to the emperors power-hungry son.

programme.title: 3:10 to Yuma (2007)
programme.desc: Remake of the 1957 Western about a rancher escorting an outlaw to a rendezvous with the law, while the latters henchmen try to head them off and free their leader.

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds (2009)
programme.desc: An American military officer leads a special squad of soldiers who perform quick strikes against the Nazis in enemy territory. They team up with a French theatre owner whose parents were killed by the Third Reich in a plot to execute Hitler and his right-hand men at a screening at the theatre.

programme.title: The Long Kiss Goodnight (1996)
programme.desc: Geena Davis stars in this action-packed thriller about a schoolteacher with amnesia. When a car accident triggers her memory, she teams with a PI to uncover her past, and finds she was a cold-blooded assassin for the CIA. Samuel L. Jackson, Patrick Malahide, Craig Bierko, David Morse.

programme.title: Ghost (1990)
programme.desc: A murdered New York banker returns to protect his girlfriend, with help from a psychic.

programme.title: The Gift (2015)
programme.desc: Simon and Robyn, a young married couple, find their lives thrown into a tailspin after Simon has a chance encounter with a former acquaintance, the off-kilter Gordo, who begins to surprise the couple with unwanted and increasingly menacing gifts.

programme.title: Prospect (2018)
programme.desc: A teenage girl and her father travel to a remote alien moon, aiming to strike it rich. Theyve secured a contract to harvest a large deposit of the elusive gems hidden in the depths of the moons toxic forest. But there are others roving the wilderness and the job quickly devolves into a fight to survive.

programme.title: Scary Movie 3 (2003)
programme.desc: This sequel spoofs "Signs", "The Ring", "The Matrix Reloaded", "The Others", "The Sixth Sense" and "8 Mile".

programme.title: Ida Red (2021)
programme.desc: After being given 20 years in prison for armed robbery, career criminal Ida "Red" Walker fears that she wont survive long enough to see through her sentence due to being diagnosed with a terminal illness. Intent on staging one last heist, she turns to her son and right hand Wyatt to help her bring her plans to completion, and to give her a chance to regain her freedom.

programme.title: Luce (2019)
programme.desc: Doting white parents question how well they really know their picture-perfect African son Luce after his high school teacher raises suspicions about his behavior. Luce is the picture of an American success story, becoming valedictorian and a track star after being adopted from the war-torn country of Eritrea, but perhaps he isnt as well-adjusted as his parents expect. Based on JC Lees play of the same name.

programme.title: Just Mercy (2019)
programme.desc: With huge opportunities laid down even before he graduated from Harvard Law School, Bryan Stevensons career is shaping up to be an impressive one. He, however, decides to forgo all of those offers in order to go to Alabama and represent those who cannot afford a lawyer and those who are wrongly accused. There, he takes on the case of an African-American man wrongly imprisoned for the murder of a white woman.

programme.title: Seabiscuit (2003)
programme.desc: A triumphant Cinderella story about the crowd-pleasing Depression-era thoroughbred Seabiscuit. Together, Seabiscuits downtrodden jockey, wizened trainer and entrepreneurial owner lead the horse to several victories that helped to inspire a Americans during the downtrodden 1930s.

programme.title: Treasure (2024)
programme.desc: An American journalist decides to travel back to Poland with her Holocaust-surviving father. The goal of their trip was to revisit some of his favorite childhood locations. But an internal resistance to his past trauma proved to be more difficult than originally thought.

programme.title: Wild Things (1998)
programme.desc: Twists lurk in every corner of this steamy potboiler about a teacher involved in a dangerous scheme in which no one is who they appear to be.

programme.title: From Friendship to Lust (2020)
programme.desc: Best friends move to Los Angeles and experience new pleasures.

programme.title: Free Birds (2013)
programme.desc: Two turkeys travel back in time to the first Thanksgiving in order to change the traditional menu and save their kind from being served with a side of cranberry sauce.

programme.title: Out of Darkness (2022)
programme.desc: Six adventurers arrive on an ancient shore seeking refuge. Soon, their dreams dissolve into dread when they encounter a malevolent force. Amidst fracturing bonds, a courageous young woman confronts the unsettling truth that survival demands unspeakable choices against an enigmatic and menacing adversary, forcing them to navigate the darkest corners of their humanity to endure.

programme.desc: While grappling with her seemingly insurmountable grief, a young woman named Vanessa embarks on a retreat in search of some solace. However, she soon discovers that the lines between different realities have begun to blur, and she finds herself caught in the crossfire.

programme.title: Breath of Fire
programme.desc: Charismatic Katie Griggs, who takes on the name Guru Jagat, espouses the teachings of Yogi Bhajan, a mysterious Punjabi Sikh who brought his version of Kundalini yoga to the United States in 1969. Former followers of Yogi Bhajan discuss the social conditions of the '60s and '70s that led to the rise of anti-establishment spirituality and the growth of Yogi Bhajan's following. (Repeat).

programme.title: Breath of Fire
programme.desc: Yogi Bhajan's backstory and the invention of his mystical persona who preached a healthy, drug-free lifestyle, enlightenment, and equality is scrutinized. Former followers recount the rigor of his teachings including physical hardships, unusual rules, and abuse. By 2007, Kundalini yoga hits the mainstream and years later Katie Griggs opens the RA MA Institute in Los Angeles, claiming direct links to Yogi Bhajan. (Repeat).

programme.title: Breath of Fire
programme.desc: The lavish lifestyle that Yogi Bhajan led with are now the luxuries that Guru Jagat enjoys as the spiritual leader of RA MA Institute. Former RA MA employees describe the business model of the company and the increasingly erratic behavior of Guru Jagat. A tell-all 2020 memoir changes the narrative about Bhajan but Guru Jagat and RA MA continue to staunchly and publicly defend Yogi Bhajan's legacy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Breath of Fire
programme.desc: A growing movement online builds to discredit RA MA and Guru Jagat, calling on aggrieved members to come forward with their stories of abuse. COVID-19 hits and Guru Jagat's messaging espouses wild conspiracy theories and a mistrust of the mainstream while her business and health begins to quickly unravel. (Repeat).

The film won three Oscars, including Best Visual Effects. (Repeat).

He soon discovers that his mission leads to the creation of a multiverse where General Zod is on the rise and there are no superheroes to fight him. Allen must navigate the multiverse to find Batman and convince him to save the world. (Repeat).

Adapted from author Sara Gruen's bestselling novel. (Repeat).

programme.desc: Días antes de la conmemoración de la Independencia Americana, los observatorios astrofísicos de toda el mundo comienzan a registrar una avalancha de naves alienígenas que se aproximan a la Tierra. Pronto estas naves comienzan a atacar el Planeta.

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: Las joyas de la comedia Tina Fey y Amy Poehler se unen en esta demoledora y traviesa aventura. Fay interpreta a una mujer exitosa que no puede tener hijos y arregla que una joven insensata de clase trabajadora sea la madre biológica de su hijo. Steve Martin, Sigourney Weaver. Escrita y dirigida por Michael McCullers.

programme.title: Superman
programme.desc: Un niño del planeta Krypton es criado por granjeros en Kansas y sólo cuando crece se entera que posee superpoderes para luchar contra el mal.

programme.title: Night Is Not Eternal
programme.desc: Un mundo oscuro esconde secretos que desafían la realidad. Misterios ocultos se revelan a medida que el peligro acecha. La esperanza brilla en la lucha por la verdad.

programme.title: Dune, Prophecy
programme.desc: Un joven noble descubre un oscuro secreto familiar en un planeta desértico. Debe enfrentar peligros y cumplir con su destino para salvar a su pueblo.

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: La historia de seis chicos de Compton, uno de los barrios más peligrosos de Los Ángeles, que formaron el grupo de rap N.W.A. y revolucionaron no sólo el mundo de la música, sino toda la sociedad.

programme.title: El planeta de Janet
programme.desc: Durante un verano de 1991 en el oeste de Massachusetts, tres personas entran en las vidas de Lacy, de 11 años, y su madre Janet.

programme.title: Dune, Prophecy
programme.desc: Un joven noble descubre un oscuro secreto familiar en un planeta desértico. Debe enfrentar peligros y cumplir con su destino para salvar a su pueblo.

programme.title: Surveilled
programme.desc: En un mundo donde la privacidad es un lujo, una persona descubre que está siendo observada constantemente. Este inquietante descubrimiento cambia su vida para siempre.

programme.title: The Girl With the Dragon Tattoo
programme.desc: El periodista desacreditado Mikael Blomkvist y la misteriosa pirata informática Lisbeth Salander trabajan juntos para resolver el misterio de un asesinato ocurrido 40 años atrás y así destapar los secretos oscuros de una familia rica.

programme.title: Need for Speed
programme.desc: El más famoso de los videojuegos de carreras llega a la gran pantalla para dejar a los más fanáticos boquiabiertos. Need for Speed cuenta la historia de un experto en automovilismo (Aaron Paul), el cual tiene un garage en dónde transforma coches para hacerlos más rápidos de lo que son para poder competir en carreras ilegales. Entró en la cárcel por un delito que no había cometido, justo cuando su mejor amigo muere en una carrera, y ahora sale de allí para vengarse.

programme.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey
programme.desc: Bibo Bolsón viajará a la Montaña Solitaria para reclamar el reino perdido de los enanos de Erebor, conquistado tiempo atrás por el dragón Smaug. Para conseguir su objetivo necesitará ayuda del mago Gandalf y de los trece enanos que le acompañan. Durante su odisea deberá enfrentarse a todo tipo de criaturas, entre las que se encuentra Gollum, de quien conseguirá el valioso anillo de oro.

programme.title: The Making of the Penguin
programme.desc: Un pingüino lucha por sobrevivir en la Antártida. Explora su vida diaria mientras enfrenta desafíos extremos y descubre la belleza de su entorno helado.

programme.title: Role Models
programme.desc: Una aventura pícara y descontrolada acerca de dos amigos facilistas y alocados que deben cumplir con un trabajo comunitario que los obliga a cuidar de dos niños problemáticos, uno es un joven rechazado y el otro un pequeño mal hablado.

programme.title: Trap
programme.desc: Spanish language version. Un padre y su hija adolescente asisten a un concierto de musica pop, cuando se dan cuenta que estan en el centro de un evento oscuro y siniestro. Josh Hartnett, Ariel Donoghue.

programme.title: Dune, Prophecy
programme.desc: Un joven noble descubre un oscuro secreto familiar en un planeta desértico. Debe enfrentar peligros y cumplir con su destino para salvar a su pueblo.

programme.title: Cyrus
programme.desc: Un hombre divorciado conoce una mujer madura en una fiesta y comienza una relación. Pero el hijo mayor de ella, quien tiene un profundo cariño por su madre, no tiene interés de compartirla.

programme.title: Surveilled
programme.desc: En un mundo donde la privacidad es un lujo, una persona descubre que está siendo observada constantemente. Este inquietante descubrimiento cambia su vida para siempre.

programme.title: Dune, Prophecy
programme.desc: Un joven noble descubre un oscuro secreto familiar en un planeta desértico. Debe enfrentar peligros y cumplir con su destino para salvar a su pueblo.

programme.title: The Three Musketeers
programme.desc: Esta nueva adaptación de la famosa novela de aventuras de Alejandro Dumas, cuenta la historia de D'Artagnan, un joven que abandona su hogar con el objetivo de convertirse en un mosquetero, y que vive grandes aventuras y proezas junto a sus compañeros Athos, Porthos y Aramis.

programme.title: Dune, Prophecy
programme.desc: Un joven noble descubre un oscuro secreto familiar en un planeta desértico. Debe enfrentar peligros y cumplir con su destino para salvar a su pueblo.

programme.title: Lady Bird
programme.desc: Un cuento sobre el crecimiento y el paso de la adolescencia a la madurez, situado en el 2002 en Sacramento, una adolescente excéntrica que asiste a una escuela secundaria católica lidia con el dolor del primer amor y los enfrentamientos con su madre sobre sus planes para el futuro.

programme.title: Jurassic Park III
programme.desc: El Dr. Alan Grant y su grupo deberán enfrentar muchas bestias mientras buscan a un niño perdido.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: Jon Martello lo tiene todo: su coche, su casa, su trabajo, su familia, sus amigos de parranda... y su pornografía. Jon, a pesar de ser un conquistador nato (sus amigos le llaman Don Jon, por don Juan) y estar con varias mujeres todos los fines de semana, no consigue una vida sexual plena. Esto le hace depender de la pornografía. Pero su vida cambiará cuando conozca a dos mujeres muy distintas...

programme.title: Ghosts of Girlfriends Past
programme.desc: Un mujeriego es atrapado por sus viejos instintos en la fiesta de bodas de su hermano. Luego de haber conquistado a casi toda la fiesta, es guiado por "fantasmas de novias del pasado" en un tour para persuadirlo al cambio.

programme.title: I Don't Know How She Does It
programme.desc: Una madre dedicada se esfuerza por balancear su demandante trabajo con el estrés de criar a sus dos niños y mantener un matrimonio sano. Después, ella es tentada por un colega, mientras su esposo desempleado recibe una oferta de trabajo lucrativa.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: La Princesa Diana de las amazonas es La Mujer Maravilla, que fue concebida por su madre como una figura de arcilla, que luego cobró vida por la súplica de la diosa Afrodita. Gracias a ella, Diana creció siendo la más bella amazona de la Isla Paraíso. Con la sabiduría de Atenea, la fuerza de Hércules y la agilidad de Hermes, se alzó con el primer puesto en la competencia que premiaba a la mujer más poderosa. Ahora, deberá dejar la isla para ayudar a los mortales en su lucha contra el nazismo.

programme.title: Unstoppable
programme.desc: Un experimentado ingeniero de ferrocarriles está a punto de ser despedido de su empresa, pero antes conoce al novato que lo va a sustituir. La situación cambia cuando un tren lleno de un peligroso combustible empieza a saltarse estaciones a toda velocidad poniendo en peligro la vida de miles de personas.

programme.title: Dune, Prophecy
programme.desc: Un joven noble descubre un oscuro secreto familiar en un planeta desértico. Debe enfrentar peligros y cumplir con su destino para salvar a su pueblo.

programme.title: The Iron Claw
programme.desc: La historia real de los inseparables hermanos Von Erich.

programme.title: Civil War
programme.desc: A journey across a dystopian future America, following a team of military-embedded journalists as they race against time to reach DC before rebel factions descend upon the White House.

programme.title: Dune, Prophecy
programme.desc: Un joven noble descubre un oscuro secreto familiar en un planeta desértico. Debe enfrentar peligros y cumplir con su destino para salvar a su pueblo.

programme.title: He's just not that into you
programme.desc: Las relaciones sentimentales de un grupo dan vueltas y se enredan cuando indagan sobre lo que constituye el amor verdadero.

programme.title: The Upside of Anger
programme.desc: Wonderful performances and rich characters color this comedy-drama starring Joan Allen and Kevin Costner. Allen excels as a suburban housewife and mother of four daughters who spins into bitter alcoholism after her husband leaves her. But her romantic life becomes even more complicated when she's drawn to a boozy, lazy ex-baseball player (Costner). Erika Christensen, Evan Rachel Wood. (Repeat).

programme.title: Jersey Boys
programme.desc: This bittersweet saga dramatizes the rise and fall of Frankie Valli and the Four Seasons, one of the key pop groups of the early '60s, responsible for such iconic hits as "Sherry," "Walk Like a Man" and "Big Girls Don't Cry." (Repeat).

programme.title: Disobedience
programme.desc: A formerly exiled woman returns to her orthodox Jewish family after the death of her father. Her family is shocked by her visit, but her sister-in-law is inspired by her presence to break free from the rigid rules and guidelines of their faith. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.sub-title: When You're Lost in the Darkness
programme.desc: A hardened survivor is hired for an impossible task. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: In 2003, an Indonesian scientist makes a devastating discovery. In 2023, now outside of the quarantine zone, Joel and Tess clash over Ellie's fate as they navigate a long-abandoned Boston overrun with Infected. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: After a global pandemic, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last Of Us
programme.desc: After a pandemic destroys civilization, a hardened survivor takes charge of a 14-year-old girl who may be humanity's last hope. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: On the streets of a newly free Kansas City, Henry fights to protect his brother Sam from rebel soldiers who will stop at nothing to appease their ruthless leader. As her manhunt continues, Kathleen doubles down on her quest for revenge, while Ellie forms a meaningful friendship. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: After months of traveling, Joel and Ellie receive a grave warning about what lies ahead. Later, Ellie learns more about Joel's past – while Joel tries his best to forget. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: As Joel fights to survive, Ellie's struggle to save him stirs memories of her life in a FEDRA orphanage. Weeks before meeting Joel, Ellie recalls joining her best friend Riley for a night to remember... one that will change the course of both of their lives – and the fate of the world – forever. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last Of Us
programme.desc: Ellie crosses paths with a vengeful group of survivors, and draws the attention of its leader. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last of Us
programme.desc: After being pursued by Infected, a pregnant Anna places her trust in a lifelong friend. Years later, Ellie is forced to grapple with the emotional toll of her journey, while Joel faces a devastating decision of his own. (Repeat).

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: The Mad Max movie prequel follows Furiosa as a young woman after she is snatched from her sanctuary by Dementus' biker horde. When her path collides with the Citadel ruled by the tyrant Immortan Joe, Furiosa finds herself entangled in a power struggle. Furiosa fights through dangerous trials to find her lost loved ones in the Green Place of Many Mothers. She must fight for survival and redemption in order to return home. (Repeat).

programme.title: Trap
programme.desc: Teenager Jody and her dad accompany each other at a music concert featuring pop star Lady Raven. Excited to share a night of music and fun, Jody and her dad soon become entangled in a deadly game. While she enjoys the music, her dad discovers a frantic FBI search for a deranged killer called The Butcher. As the hunt intensifies, a sinister truth is revealed. (Repeat).

programme.title: Demolition
programme.desc: In this intriguing dramedy, an investment banker copes with his wife's sudden death by dismantling the machines surrounding him. Meanwhile, his complaints to a vending-machine company spark an unexpected relationship with a customer-service rep. (Repeat).

programme.title: Priscilla
programme.desc: After bumping into Elvis Presley at a party, teenager Priscilla Beaulieu becomes enamored with the musical icon. Their courtship and consequent marriage change Priscilla's life. What follows is a tantalizing, turbulent journey of love and fame. Based on the true story of the Presley family, the drama film chronicles Priscilla's relationship with Elvis Presley. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Watchers
programme.desc: In rural western Ireland, Mina, a twentysomething artist, finds herself lost amidst an expansive wilderness. Upon finding shelter for the night with three strangers, the unlikely foursome soon finds themselves the target of a sinister, enigmatic creature haunting the night. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Other Side of the Door
programme.desc: An American family living in India are devastated when their son is killed in an accident. The wife soon performs a Hindu ritual to speak to the dead, but her actions cause her family to be haunted by an otherworldly force in this chilling horror film. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Birdcage
programme.desc: A flamboyantly gay couple pretend to be straight in order to impress the parents of the woman their son wants to marry because the girl's father is a rabidly right-wing U.S. Senator. (Repeat).

programme.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
programme.desc: Grappling with the onset of middle age, a Chinese immigrant discovers that she can traverse across time and space. Teaming up with her alternate lives, the unlikely allies realize that they alone possess the power to protect the world from calamity, plunging them into the midst of an outlandish quest. (Repeat).

programme.title: 17 Again
programme.desc: Hilarity scores a slam dunk when a former high-school basketball star gets a second shot at life after he's transformed back into a teenager. Back in high school, Mike O'Donnell was an MVP. But then Mike sacrificed everything in order to stay by his expectant girlfriend Scarlett. Twenty years later, Mike's life is falling apart when he's suddenly transported back into his teenage body and he learns that by trying to recapture his best years, he could risk losing it all. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Last Black Man in San Francisco
programme.desc: A black man who lives with his best friend and works in an elderly care facility dreams of living in the grand Victorian house his grandfather built in the Fillmore District. Now a white, affluent area, he is totally priced out of the neighborhood, but it doesn't stop him from dreaming in this drama about place, identity and race. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: A San Francisco police detective becomes frustrated when the laws of the day keep him from apprehending a crazed sniper who is terrorizing the city. (Repeat).

programme.title: Unforgiven
programme.desc: In this thrilling and provocative revisionist Western, a former gunslinger-turned-farmer agrees to help hunt down two cowboys who assaulted and disfigured a prostitute. However, his quest brings him into conflict with an authoritarian sheriff. (Repeat).

programme.title: Love Lies Bleeding
programme.desc: Reclusive gym manager Lou falls hard for Jackie, an ambitious bodybuilder headed through town to Las Vegas in pursuit of her dream. But their love ignites violence, pulling them deep into the web of Lou's criminal family. (Repeat).

programme.title: Joker
programme.desc: During the 1980s, a failed stand-up comedian is driven insane and turns to a life of crime and chaos in Gotham City while becoming an infamous psychopathic crime figure. (Repeat).

programme.title: Prisoners
programme.desc: In this provocative, heart-stopping thriller, a small-town man butts heads with a cop after his daughter and her best friend are kidnapped. (Repeat).

programme.title: Attack the Block
programme.desc: When aliens invade a poor neighborhood in London in this thrilling sci-fi romp, a group of rowdy teens decide to fight back and defend their home turf, while a woman (Jodie Whittaker) whom they mugged inadvertently gets caught up in their struggle. (Repeat).

programme.title: Her
programme.desc: A lonely writer falls for his computer's operating system in this quirky and endearing romance. Meanwhile, as the perceptive software draws him out of his shell, he struggles with a difficult divorce from his childhood sweetheart. (Repeat).

programme.title: It Comes at Night
programme.desc: In this unnerving horror film, a married couple and their teenage son isolate themselves from the rest of humanity when a plague throws civilization into chaos. However, their secluded existence is threatened when a young family seek shelter with them. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Company You Keep
programme.desc: When a reporter reveals that a former member of the Weather Underground has been living under an assumed identity as a lawyer, the former radical goes on the run so he can get his affairs in order before the FBI catches him in this emotional thriller. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Farewell
programme.desc: After her beloved grandmother is diagnosed with terminal cancer, a Chinese-American woman returns to China for a family gathering secretly designed to say goodbye to the matriarch. However, when it becomes apparent that grandma is the only one unaware of the diagnosis, she struggles to keep the secret. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Upside of Anger
programme.desc: Wonderful performances and rich characters color this comedy-drama starring Joan Allen and Kevin Costner. Allen excels as a suburban housewife and mother of four daughters who spins into bitter alcoholism after her husband leaves her. But her romantic life becomes even more complicated when she's drawn to a boozy, lazy ex-baseball player (Costner). Erika Christensen, Evan Rachel Wood. (Repeat).

programme.title: Signs
programme.desc: M. Night Shyamalan wrote this spooky story starring Mel Gibson as Graham Hess, a disillusioned ex-minister who discovers mysterious crop circles on his farm and suspects local vandals. But before long, similar incidents are occurring all over the world---and terror looms on the horizon. Joaquin Phoenix, Cherry Jones, Rory Culkin. (Repeat).

programme.title: Hemingway & Gellhorn
programme.desc: A 1936 meeting between novelist Ernest Hemingway and war correspondent Martha Gellhorn sparks a nine-year relationship dominated by a volatile romance that nearly rivaled the combat zones into which they threw themselves in Spain, China and World War II. (Repeat).

programme.title: Knox Goes Away
programme.desc: After being diagnosed with a rare form of dementia that has a rapid decline, John Knox tries desperately to continue his work as a hitman, with memory loss getting in the way. When John's son Miles shows up at his door begging for help because he's killed the man who impregnated his daughter, John goes into overdrive with his friend Xavier to cover up the crime. Unfortunately, his good intentions for Miles backfires, and soon, his son is involved in John's criminal world. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: In this thrilling and inspirational sci-fi drama, a lone astronaut is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars, and must use his ingenuity to create a habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, his crewmates and a team of scientists work to rescue him, in defiance of NASA protocol. (Repeat).

programme.title: Bodies Bodies Bodies
programme.desc: As an intense tropical storm bears down on a remote family estate, a cohort of privileged, out-of-touch twenty-somethings plans to spare no expense for an explosive party. Yet, their evening of drunken merriment soon takes a sinister turn when an innocent game yields fatal consequences, all the while exposing the fake personalities that lie beneath the friends' carefully curated exteriors. (Repeat).

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.desc: Series premiere. Seventeen-year-old Rue returns home from rehab with no plans to stay clean. She meets Jules, who's new in town, at a party at McKay's house. Nate gets in McKay's head when McKay takes an interest in Cassie. Nate and Maddy, who have broken up once again, attempt to make each other jealous. Meanwhile, Kat is pressured to lose something. (Repeat).

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.desc: On the first day of school, Rue's excited about her new friend, Jules, but struggles to put the past behind her and gets into trouble at Fezco's. Nate becomes obsessed with Maddy's (Alexa Demie) hookup, Tyler, while trying to get back together with Maddy. Kat finds out that a video of her has surfaced online. McKay takes the stress of college out on Cassie. (Repeat).

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.desc: Kat decides to try camming and has her first session; Jules starts falling for a boy online and asks Rue to help her take some nudes; Maddy finds something odd on Nate's phone; Cassie and McKay spend the weekend at his school and go to a party at the frat he's rushing. (Repeat).

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.desc: Rue tries to get clean for Jules and chaperones Gia at the carnival. Jules encounters Cal with his family. Cassie and Maddy, annoyed at their boyfriends, decide to do molly together. Kat hangs out with Ethan until she misreads a situation. Nate reveals who he really is. (Repeat).

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.desc: In the aftermath of the carnival, Maddy and Nate are forced to deal with a police investigation. Jules begins to feel pressured by her role in Rue's sobriety. Kat ignores a confused Ethan and embraces her new lifestyle. Cassie tries to distance herself from Daniel and focus on her relationship with McKay. Cal worries about how his actions have affected his sons. (Repeat).

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.desc: On Halloween, Rue worries about her reliance on Jules, while Jules starts exhibiting concerning behavior. McKay questions his future in football. After a weird night with McKay, Cassie spends some time with Daniel. Business is booming for Kat as she continues to push Ethan away. Nate comes up with a plan to get his life back on track. (Repeat).

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.sub-title: The Trials and Tribulations of Trying to Pee While Depressed
programme.desc: Rue gets depressed and watches 22 straight episodes of a British reality show; Jules goes to visit an old friend; Cassie looks for advice in the aftermath of Halloween night. (Repeat).

programme.title: Euphoria
programme.sub-title: And Salt the Earth Behind You
programme.desc: In the Season 1 finale, it's the winter formal at East Highland. (Repeat).

programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: This horror-mystery film follows awkward teen Owen who, in the 1990s, becomes a big fan of a monster-driven horror television show called The Pink Opaque. In school, he encounters another awkward teen, Maddy, who also likes the show. The two form a bond by watching the show. But when the show is canceled, their interaction also dwindles. Reconnecting again in their twenties, they revisit their fandom of the show as their reality also starts shifting mysteriously. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Express
programme.desc: Fact-based sports biopic stars Rob Brown as Syracuse University running back Ernie Davis, the first African-American to win the Heisman Trophy as the outstanding college-football player. Dennis Quaid costars as Syracuse coach Ben Schwartzwalder. Directed by Gary Fleder. (Repeat).

programme.title: Demolition
programme.desc: In this intriguing dramedy, an investment banker copes with his wife's sudden death by dismantling the machines surrounding him. Meanwhile, his complaints to a vending-machine company spark an unexpected relationship with a customer-service rep. (Repeat).

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: The Mad Max movie prequel follows Furiosa as a young woman after she is snatched from her sanctuary by Dementus' biker horde. When her path collides with the Citadel ruled by the tyrant Immortan Joe, Furiosa finds herself entangled in a power struggle. Furiosa fights through dangerous trials to find her lost loved ones in the Green Place of Many Mothers. She must fight for survival and redemption in order to return home. (Repeat).

programme.title: Youth
programme.desc: In this moving drama, two aging friends, one a retired composer and the other a filmmaker working on a new project, go on vacation together at a spa resort in the Alps. There, they take stock of their lives and reflect on their artistic accomplishments. (Repeat).

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Electrifying chronicle of the seminal rap group N.W.A. and their 'hood-to-riches success, tracing their story from the mean streets of mid-'80s Compton to their triumphant battles against censorship. (Repeat).

programme.title: Tuesday
programme.desc: The family drama film centers on teenager Tuesday and her relationship with her mother, Zora. In a surreal twist, Tuesday finds a talking bird that she soon discovers is Death in disguise. Mother and daughter find themselves dealing with this unique encounter as a team despite their different perspecties. What follows is an eye-opening journey where the duo explore the depths of loss and love in unexpected ways. (Repeat).

programme.title: Panic Room
programme.desc: A mother and her diabetic preteen daughter hide in a fortified, high-tech, hidden chamber when thieves break into their New York City home, but more problems arise after they leave behind the girl's medications. (Repeat).

programme.title: Pulling Strings
programme.desc: This adorable comedy follows an ambitious mariachi singer who hopes to convince a customs worker to accept his visa, and finds love in the process. (Repeat).

programme.title: Black Adam
programme.desc: Black Adam is awakened after being imprisoned for nearly five thousand years. This significant being tries to exist in modern climes despite his brusque ways and ancient-trained means. The members of the Justice Society of America try to befriend him, hopefully retraining him as well. They need to come together soon to fight a more powerful villain about to wreak havoc on the world. (Repeat).

programme.title: Forever My Girl
programme.desc: A country-music star returns to his hometown, where he reconnects with an old flame—and is shocked to learn that they have a daughter together. In time, he reflects on the life he left behind and the man he wants to be in this stirring romance. (Repeat).

programme.title: Shorts
programme.desc: Imagination breeds hilarity when a rainbow-colored rock grants a boy named Toe (Jimmy Bennett) his every wish, causing his corporate-run town to be overrun with miniature spaceships and crocodile armies. Once the grown-ups get their hands on the rock, the real trouble begins. (Repeat).

programme.title: Belichick & Saban: The Art of Coaching
programme.desc: Bill Belichick and Nick Saban--two of the most successful and revered football coaches in the history of the sport--open up in this documentary that looks at their four-decade-long friendship. Combined with one-on-one interviews and extensive inside access captured over the past three decades, the film includes topics never publicly broached before. (Repeat).

programme.title: How to Eat Fried Worms
programme.desc: Excellent coming-of-age fare about a new kid (Luke Benward) in school who may have bitten off more than he can chew when he bets the school bully (Adam Hicks) that he can swallow 10 creepy crawlies. Written and directed by Bob Dolman, who adapted the 1973 Thomas Rockwell kid-lit best seller, which received an animated TV treatment in 1985. Hallie Kate Eisenberg, Tom Cavanagh, Kimberly Williams-Paisley, James Rebhorn. (Repeat).

programme.title: Rio
programme.desc: In this thrilling animated adventure, a rare macaw named Blu (voice of Jesse Eisenberg) is brought to Rio de Janeiro to mate with a female (voice of Anne Hathaway) of his species, but the pair are kidnapped by a gang of greedy animal smugglers, forcing them to stage a daring escape with the help of some new friends. (Repeat).

programme.title: Gulliver's Travels
programme.desc: A rollicking adventure about a mail-room clerk who finds himself shipwrecked on an island inhabited by a minuscule race of people, who make him look like a giant by comparison. (Repeat).

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: In this hilarious installment of the beloved series, Shrek is catapulted into an alternate version of Far Far Away where ogres are persecuted, Rumpelstiltskin rules the land and Princess Fiona doesn't know who he is. (Repeat).

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: In this stunning action epic, a tormented Hercules must summon his inner hero to save the kingdom of Thrace from an evil warlord. With the help of his loyal band of mercenaries, he wages a valiant fight to restore peace to the troubled land. (Repeat).

programme.title: Spy Kids: All the Time in the World
programme.desc: Retired spy Marissa (Jessica Alba) is reactivated by her agency in order to stop the Timekeeper from taking the entire planet hostage, and she gets some unexpected help from her stepdaughter Rebecca and stepson Cecil in this family-friendly thrill ride. (Repeat).

programme.title: Marmaduke
programme.desc: In this family-friendly comedy, a super-size Great Dane named Marmaduke, who's prone to making messes, moves with his loving family to California where he suffers from culture shock and tries to win the heart of a female canine. (Repeat).

programme.title: Denial
programme.desc: After accusing fellow historian David Irving of being a Holocaust denier, Deborah Lipstadt is sued for libel and forced to provide proof of her claims in court. This gripping drama is based on a real-life legal case, which reached a verdict in 2000. (Repeat).

actor.role: Professor Robert Jan van der Pelt

programme.title: X-Men: Apocalypse
programme.desc: In this action-packed comic-book adventure set in the 1980s, the X-Men are forced to confront an ancient mutant called Apocalypse. After the resurrected villain recruits four superpowered followers, Professor X and his charges attempt to stop them. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dune
programme.desc: In the year 10,191, an emperor rules the universe consisting of two rival factions, and power relies on control of a magic spice. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Tomorrow Man
programme.desc: One is preparing for a disaster that will never happen, the other is buying things she'll never need. But in a small town, these two try and find love. (Repeat).

programme.title: Cats & Dogs: The Revenge of Kitty Galore
programme.desc: Feline spy Kitty Galore plots to conquer the world and gain the upper paw over her rivals in this hilarious comedy-adventure. In order to fight this unforeseen threat, cats and dogs must band together to face a common enemy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Forever My Girl
programme.desc: A country-music star returns to his hometown, where he reconnects with an old flame—and is shocked to learn that they have a daughter together. In time, he reflects on the life he left behind and the man he wants to be in this stirring romance. (Repeat).

programme.title: I Have Tourette's but Tourette's Doesn't Have Me
programme.desc: A look at children coping with Tourette Syndrome as they face the challenges of their condition and ridicule from their peers. Produced and directed by Ellen Goosenberg Kent. (Repeat).

programme.title: Kareem: Minority of One
programme.desc: A look at the life and career of NBA Hall of Famer Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, the league's all-time leading scorer and six-time MVP and World Champion. In addition to his on-court success, the film also explores his off-court persona over the past 50 years. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
programme.desc: This stunning fantasy adventure follows the Pevensie siblings and their cousin Eustace as they face their greatest temptations in the land of Narnia, where they travel on a magnificent ship known as the Dawn Treader. (Repeat).

programme.title: Marmaduke
programme.desc: In this family-friendly comedy, a super-size Great Dane named Marmaduke, who's prone to making messes, moves with his loving family to California where he suffers from culture shock and tries to win the heart of a female canine. (Repeat).

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes
programme.desc: In this action-packed adaptation starring Robert Downey Jr. as Sir Arthur Conan Doyle's legendary detective, Sherlock Holmes teams with Watson to battle Lord Blackwood, a mysterious new adversary who's determined to destroy England. (Repeat).

programme.title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
programme.desc: Ordinary teen Billy Batson possesses the ability to transform into a superhero alter ego with just a single word. As Batson continues to hone his crimefighting skills and tackle new challenges, he faces a threat that puts his life in jeopardy. The sequel to the 2019 film. (Repeat).

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
programme.desc: In this charming family film, Alvin, Simon and Theodore head out on the road in a desperate race to find Dave after they are led to believe that he is about to propose to his girlfriend and leave them behind forever. (Repeat).

programme.title: Flipped
programme.desc: Schoolboy Bryce (Callan McAuliffe) realizes that the girl he has struggled to avoid may be his one true love in this heartfelt romantic comedy. Over the course of six years, Juli pines for Bryce, who does everything in his power to put her off. Later, as the pair enter junior high, Bryce discovers girls and realizes his true feelings for Juli. (Repeat).

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: After being separated from his family, a young pig befriends his fellow farm animals and learns to be a useful member of the farm by herding sheep, all in an effort to save himself from ending up on someone's dinner plate. (Repeat).

programme.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: Chipmunk brothers Alvin, Simon and Theodore, with lovely (though high-pitched) singing voices, become pop sensations in this rollicking comedy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Created in a San Francisco lab by an ambitious father-and-son scientist team seeking to cure Alzheimer's disease, genetically engineered chimp Caesar (Andy Serkis) uses his powerful intellect to lead an ape uprising in this thrilling sci-fi prequel. (Repeat).

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: An Amazon princess leaves her island home and journeys to the outside world, which is being consumed by a massive war. With the help of an American pilot, she works to put an end to the conflict in this thrilling origin story. (Repeat).

programme.title: Real Women Have Curves
programme.desc: Newcomer America Ferrera and veteran character actor Lupe Ontiveros give compelling performances in this charming character study about a mother (Ontiveros) and daughter (Ferrera) who clash over everything from choosing a career to finding a husband. The film won the Audience Award at the 2002 Sundance Film Festival. Jorge Cervera Jr., Ingrid Oliu, George Lopez, Brian Sites, Soledad St. Hilaire. (Repeat).

programme.title: How to Eat Fried Worms
programme.desc: Excellent coming-of-age fare about a new kid (Luke Benward) in school who may have bitten off more than he can chew when he bets the school bully (Adam Hicks) that he can swallow 10 creepy crawlies. Written and directed by Bob Dolman, who adapted the 1973 Thomas Rockwell kid-lit best seller, which received an animated TV treatment in 1985. Hallie Kate Eisenberg, Tom Cavanagh, Kimberly Williams-Paisley, James Rebhorn. (Repeat).

programme.title: Saving My Tomorrow
programme.desc: Part 1 of a six-part celebration of the natural world features children's thoughts on the environment, endangered animals and climate change. Also: readings by Tina Fey, Liam Neeson and Jeffrey Wright; performances by Lennon and Maisy, and They Might Be Giants; remarks by scientists from the American Museum of Natural History. (Repeat).

programme.title: Saving My Tomorrow
programme.desc: Part 2 of 6. A celebration of the natural world features children's thoughts on the environment, endangered animals and climate change. Also: readings by Susan Sarandon and Neil deGrasse Tyson; performances by Ziggy Marley, Willie Nelson and They Might Be Giants; remarks by scientists from the American Museum of Natural History. (Repeat).

programme.title: Saving My Tomorrow
programme.desc: Part 3 of a six-part celebration of the natural world featuring children's thoughts on environmental issues, including plastic waste and deforestation. Also: readings by Alan Cumming and Laura Dern; an appearance by Pharrell Williams; and a performance by Pete Seeger. (Repeat).

programme.title: Saving My Tomorrow
programme.desc: Part 4 of a six-part celebration of the natural world featuring children's thoughts on environmental issues, including energy use and endangered animals. Also: appearances by Elizabeth Mitchell, Willie Nelson, Dan Zanes and They Might Be Giants. (Repeat).

programme.title: Saving My Tomorrow
programme.desc: The fifth installment features more thoughts from kids and scientists about endangered species and their habitats. Offered is an inspiring take on how humans might protect the planet and everything on it. (Repeat).

programme.title: Saving My Tomorrow
programme.desc: These young people are committed to making the earth a cleaner place. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Weight of the Nation for Kids
programme.desc: A look at a group of New Orleans students called the Rethinkers, who used a media-savvy approach of public pressure and activism to force school-lunch menus to provide better choices of food and beverages. (Repeat).

programme.title: Mi Casa
programme.desc: For the first time in over a century, two sisters have the opportunity to communicate with someone new. The only issue is - he's alive. Two sisters, Geraldina and Maria, have been trapped haunting their former home for over a century. To ease the monotony of ghostly life, Geraldina enjoys spooking the living tenants while Maria prefers peace and quiet. When a new young man moves in and tries to communicate with them via ouija board, the sisters are at odds on how to proceed. (Repeat).

programme.title: Temple Grandin
programme.desc: A portrait of animal scientist Temple Grandin, who, as a young woman in the 1960s and 1970s, overcame the stigma of autism to become a leading authority on the humane treatment of livestock. (Repeat).

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Family That Preys
programme.desc: Tyler Perry wrote, directed, produced and costars in this gripping drama about a scandal that rocks two families with a lengthy history. One of them is upper-class, the other working class, and each is led by a strong-willed matriarch who are long-time friends. Kathy Bates and Alfre Woodard are outstanding as the two women trying to keep their respective families from ruining countless lives. The superb ensemble cast also features Sanaa Lathan, Cole Hauser, Rockmond Dunbar and Kadee Strickland. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: Dark hilarity ensues after the Addams family—and their macabre traditions—relocate to suburbia, 21st century New Jersey. As they prepare for a major celebration that involves their extended family, they have to maneuver around the machinations of a devious reality-television host. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
programme.desc: In the third and equally fun entry in the popular pulp-adventure series, Rick O'Connell (Brendan Fraser) and wife, Evelyn (Maria Bello), find themselves in 1940s China with their now-adult son, Alex (Luke Ford), and, of course, a troublesome mummy. This time he's a centuries-old Chinese emperor (Jet Li) with a vast undead army. Michelle Yeoh, Jonathan Carnahan, Zi Juan. (Repeat).

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire
programme.desc: The immense King Kong finds an unlikely ally in the fierce Godzilla as a new, gargantuan threat emerges from deep within the Hollow Earth to threaten all living species, including both Kong and Godzilla. The ape and the lizard must battle the new titan while their human counterparts unlock a series of new secrets hidden on Skull Island. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dune
programme.desc: In the year 10,191, an emperor rules the universe consisting of two rival factions, and power relies on control of a magic spice. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dune: Part Two
programme.desc: Determined to avenge his family, Paul Atreides joins the Fremen to build a strong war force in preparation for his battle against the Harkonnens. He must navigate the dangerous planet and harness the power of the spice. Fulfilling his destiny as the Kwisatz Haderach, his powers grow, and he becomes more confident in leading the world to the freedom they deserve. The sequel to the 2021 film chronicles the rise of Paul Atreides as a leader and hero. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Tomorrow Man
programme.desc: One is preparing for a disaster that will never happen, the other is buying things she'll never need. But in a small town, these two try and find love. (Repeat).

programme.title: Greenland
programme.desc: Upon hearing the news that a huge comet will hit Earth within 48 hours and start the dreaded apocalypse, John Garrity, his estranged wife Allison, and their son Nathan decide to make their way to Greenland, where a group of bunkers is located. The journey, however, proves to be more perilous than they anticipated. Amidst the growing panic and lawlessness around them, the family tries their hardest to catch the last flight to the last possible safe haven on the planet. (Repeat).

programme.title: Level Playing Field
programme.desc: Start of a four-part series illuminating how public policies have contributed to sports inequities and inequities in society at large. Directed by Akil Gibbons. (Repeat).

programme.title: Level Playing Field
programme.desc: Stories illuminating how public policies have contributed to inequities in the sports landscape and society at large. (Repeat).

programme.title: Level Playing Field
programme.desc: Stories illuminating how public policies have contributed to inequities in the sports landscape and society at large. (Repeat).

programme.title: Level Playing Field
programme.desc: Stories illuminating how public policies have contributed to inequities in the sports landscape and society at large. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Pink Panther
programme.desc: The first film in the series introduced maladroit French police inspector Jacques Clouseau, who attempts to foil high-society thieves who have targeted a prize jewel called the Pink Panther. Henry Mancini's score was Oscar nominated. (Repeat).

programme.title: Becoming Warren Buffett
programme.desc: A profile of Warren Buffett, CEO of the holding company Berkshire Hathaway, includes a look at his career as an investor and a philanthropist, and recollections of his personal and professional lives while speaking to high-school students in his native Omaha. (Repeat).

programme.title: Citizen U.S.A.: A 50 State Road Trip
programme.desc: Alexandra Pelosi's patriotic travelogue crisscrosses the U.S. to attend naturalization ceremonies in all 50 states and listens to recent immigrants from around the world explain their decision to become American citizens. The film is inspired by the naturalization process experienced by Pelosi's Dutch-born husband, Michiel Vos. (Repeat).

programme.title: Ice Age: Collision Course
programme.desc: Bumbling squirrel Scrat accidentally sends an asteroid hurtling toward Earth, which forces Manny the woolly mammoth, Sid the sloth and Diego the saber-toothed tiger to embark on a journey to save the planet in this winning animated sequel. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: A tornado whisks young Kansas native Dorothy and her dog Toto away to the magical land of Oz, where they befriend a Scarecrow, a Tin Man and a Cowardly Lion on their journey to visit the wonderful Wizard of Oz in this beloved classic. (Repeat).

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Madea's Tough Love
programme.desc: Madea has a run-in with the law and finds herself sentenced to community service. After discovering that the local youth center is in danger of being shut down, she enlists the help of her family and the neighborhood kids to save it. (Repeat).

programme.title: Four Christmases
programme.desc: When their annual vacation getaway falls through, a happily unmarried couple are forced to spend Christmas with the families of their four divorced parents on the same day. Reese Witherspoon and Vince Vaughn star in this warm and hilarious holiday tale. Robert Duvall, Jon Favreau, Mary Steenburgen, Dwight Yoakam. Directed by Seth Gordon. (Repeat).

programme.title: Forever My Girl
programme.desc: A country-music star returns to his hometown, where he reconnects with an old flame—and is shocked to learn that they have a daughter together. In time, he reflects on the life he left behind and the man he wants to be in this stirring romance. (Repeat).

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: Director Robert Rodriguez ("From Dusk till Dawn") crafted this family film about a married pair of former secret agents (Antonio Banderas, Carla Gugino) whose espionage genes come in handy when their kids have to rescue them from a madman who wants to rule the world. Alan Cumming, Alexa Vega, Daryl Sabara, Tony Shalhoub, Teri Hatcher, Cheech Marin. (Repeat).

programme.title: The November Man
programme.desc: The thrills never stop when an ex-CIA agent is targeted by his former protégé while racing to protect a witness. As the bullets start to fly, he must live long enough to protect his charge, and root out the mole who has put his entire mission in jeopardy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Heat
programme.desc: A successful career criminal considers getting out of the business after one last score with his crew, while an obsessive cop desperately tries to put him behind bars. The memorable "cafe scene" marks the first time Al Pacino and Robert De Niro have appeared on-screen together. (Repeat).

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: Astronauts on the International Space Station retrieve a sample from Mars and discover it contains evidence of intelligent life in this sci-fi thriller. The specimen begins to show signs of aggression, threatening the entire mission. (Repeat).

programme.title: Insomnia
programme.desc: Christopher Nolan, of "Memento" fame, directed this taut and atmospheric crime thriller, a remake of a 1997 Norwegian film. Al Pacino is in top form as L.A. detective Will Dormer, who travels to a remote Alaska town to investigate a murder. Unable to sleep, the weary Dormer is drawn into an intense cat-and-mouse game with the sly and taunting killer. Robin Williams, Hilary Swank. (Repeat).

programme.title: Friday Night Lights
programme.desc: From one of the best sports books ever written comes a compelling, fact-based chronicle of a high-school football team in West Texas. There, winning isn't everything, it's the only thing. Billy Bob Thornton stars as the coach, and country-music star Tim McGraw plays the abusive father of a player. The film was directed and co-written by Peter Berg, who adapted his cousin H.G. Bissinger's bestseller. (Repeat).

programme.title: Noah
programme.desc: Noah receives a warning from God about a great flood, and constructs an ark to save creation as the planet is cleansed of sin in this stunning Biblical epic. Later, Noah and his family are forced to defend their massive vessel from malicious invaders. (Repeat).

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Dynamic Samuel L. Jackson stars as New York City cop John Shaft, who quits the force and decides to dispense his own brand of vigilante justice against a racist killer (Christian Bale) and a Dominican drug lord (Jeffrey Wright). Richard Roundtree, who played the original John Shaft in three '70s crime dramas, has a cameo as Jackson's uncle and namesake. Busta Rhymes, Vanessa Williams, Dan Hedaya. (Repeat).

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: Thrilling action and Russell Crowe's Oscar-winning performance drive 2000's Best Picture, the story of a Roman general who is enslaved and forced to become a gladiator after he clashes with the emperor's bloodthirsty son. (Repeat).

programme.title: Bad Behaviour
programme.desc: When a former child actor tries to reconnect with her daughter, she is led to a spiritual enlightenment retreat. Their relationship is very complicated, and they put all of their trust in a guru and experimental ideas to try and bring them back together. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: After discovering the truth about their walled city and breaking down its faction system, Tris and Four lead a journey out of Chicago to learn more about who has been manipulating their civilization in this thrilling entry in the YA adventure series. But once their group comes face-to-face with the society that turned their city into an enclosed experiment, secrets are uncovered that threaten the fate of humankind. (Repeat).

programme.title: Set It Off
programme.desc: Desperate for a financial solution to their troubles, four alienated girlfriends plan a series of bank heists, growing more daring and reckless with each success. Jada Pinkett, Queen Latifah, Vivica A. Fox, Kimberly Elise, John C. McGinley, Blair Underwood, Anne Marie Horsford, Ella Joyce, Charlie Robinson, Chaz Lamar Shepard. (Repeat).

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: Thrilling action and Russell Crowe's Oscar-winning performance drive 2000's Best Picture, the story of a Roman general who is enslaved and forced to become a gladiator after he clashes with the emperor's bloodthirsty son. (Repeat).

programme.title: Margin Call
programme.desc: Investment-firm analyst Peter Sullivan (Zachary Quinto) uncovers disturbing information that could put his company in jeopardy in this riveting thriller set during the 2008 financial crisis. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie
programme.desc: A send-up of the TV series, it's the story of a lovely lady, a man named Brady, and their kids, whose wholesome '70s natures clashes with the grungy '90s. (Repeat).

programme.title: Footloose
programme.desc: An urban teen moves to a rural Midwestern town where dancing is outlawed and fights to stage a high-school prom complete with dancing. He also falls for a local girl whose minister dad is behind the dirty dancing boycott. (Repeat).

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A crack Detroit detective pursues a pal's killer through the plastic jungle of Southern California, where he tweaks authority, tumbles with the bad guys and bends the rules. (Repeat).

programme.title: Michael Clayton
programme.desc: George Clooney is superb in this intelligent and complex character study of a burned-out "fixer" at a powerful corporate law firm in New York City who faces a crisis of conscience as he comes to grips with his amoral actions. Written and directed by Tony Gilroy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Casino Royale
programme.desc: Daniel Craig kills in his first outing as British secret agent James Bond. In this gripping and ripping adaptation of Ian Fleming's first 007 adventure, Bond tries to turn the tables on a terrorist banker, whom he's engaged in a high-stakes poker game. (Repeat).

programme.title: Luce
programme.desc: Doting white parents question how well they really know their picture-perfect African son Luce after his high school teacher raises suspicions about his behavior. Luce is the picture of an American success story, becoming valedictorian and a track star after being adopted from the war-torn country of Eritrea, but perhaps he isn't as well-adjusted as his parents expect. Based on JC Lee's play of the same name. (Repeat).

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg gives a charged performance in this high-powered actioner about an ex-Marine sniper who is recruited for a clandestine special op and instead finds himself on the run after being targeted as the perpetrator of a presidential assassination attempt. Danny Glover, Kate Mara, Michael Pena, Tate Donovan, Ned Beatty, Rhona Mitra, Elias Koteas. Directed by Antoine Fuqua and written by Jonathan Lemkin, who adapted Stephen Hunter's book "Point of Impact." (Repeat).

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: This thrilling war epic is about an American military officer who leads a special squad of soldiers who perform quick strikes against the Nazis in enemy territory. They team up with a French theater owner whose parents were killed by the Third Reich for a plot to execute Hitler and his right-hand men at a screening at the theater. Directed by Quentin Tarantino. (Repeat).

programme.title: Faster
programme.desc: In this heart-pounding action thriller, Driver (Dwayne Johnson) seeks revenge on the man responsible for his brother's death, but a devoted cop gets wind of his plan and tries to stop him from carrying it out. Meanwhile, a hit man attempts to end Driver's life before he completes his task. (Repeat).

programme.title: Eyes Wide Shut
programme.desc: Stanley Kubrick's final film is an erotic thriller about an affluent married couple who are plunged into a bizarre odyssey of sexual discovery, which leads to a dangerous realm of adulterous gamesmanship between the twosome. (Repeat).

programme.title: Shooter
programme.desc: Mark Wahlberg gives a charged performance in this high-powered actioner about an ex-Marine sniper who is recruited for a clandestine special op and instead finds himself on the run after being targeted as the perpetrator of a presidential assassination attempt. Danny Glover, Kate Mara, Michael Pena, Tate Donovan, Ned Beatty, Rhona Mitra, Elias Koteas. Directed by Antoine Fuqua and written by Jonathan Lemkin, who adapted Stephen Hunter's book "Point of Impact." (Repeat).

programme.title: Casino Royale
programme.desc: Daniel Craig kills in his first outing as British secret agent James Bond. In this gripping and ripping adaptation of Ian Fleming's first 007 adventure, Bond tries to turn the tables on a terrorist banker, whom he's engaged in a high-stakes poker game. (Repeat).

programme.title: Taps
programme.desc: Military academy cadets take up arms against developers who are plotting to demolish their school. Though a General tries to quell the rebellion, he too is inspired to stand for the school when the Army is called in to rout the boys. (Repeat).

programme.title: We Were Soldiers
programme.desc: The star (Mel Gibson) and writer (Randall Wallace) of "Braveheart" reunited for this powerful war epic based on a true story. Gibson plays Lt. Col. Hal Moore, who leads U.S. troops into one of the first and bloodiest battles in Vietnam in November 1965. Madeleine Stowe, Sam Elliott, Greg Kinnear, Chris Klein, Barry Pepper, Keri Russell. (Repeat).

programme.title: Letters From Iwo Jima
programme.desc: Best Director nominee Clint Eastwood's charged companion piece to his "Flags of Our Fathers" is a poignant and impressive deconstruction of the World War II battle from the perspective of the Japanese forces. Ken Watanabe gives a commanding performance as Gen. Tadamichi Kuribayashi. The film was a Best Picture nominee and was coproduced by Eastwood and Steven Spielberg. Iris Yamashita's script was up for Best Original Screenplay. Kazunari Ninomiya, Tsuyoshi Ihara, Ryo Kase. (Repeat).

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: Six Oscars, including Best Picture and Actor (Tom Hanks), went to this extraordinary tale of a simple man who unwittingly becomes involved in some of the key moments of the 20th century. Meanwhile, as the remarkable parade of his life goes by, Forrest never forgets Jenny, the girl he loved as a boy, who makes her own journey through the turbulence of the 1960s and '70s that is far more troubled than the path Forrest happens upon. (Repeat).

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg won the Best Director Oscar for this stunning war drama following a squad of U.S. Army soldiers on a mission to rescue a GI trapped behind enemy lines in France on D-Day after all three of the soldier's brothers are killed in action. As the search commences, the close-knit squad sets out through areas still thick with Nazis. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: A bounty hunter and his captured fugitive seek refuge from a blizzard in a Wyoming mountain cabin, where they find a group of other distrustful strangers. In time, tensions boil over and bloodshed ensues in this nerve-shredding Western thriller. (Repeat).

programme.title: Old School
programme.desc: Luke Wilson, Vince Vaughn and Will Ferrell star in this raucous comedy reminiscent of "Animal House." They play three disillusioned men who decide to start a fraternity near their old college in an effort to recapture their youth. (Repeat).

programme.title: Road Trip
programme.desc: Tom Green's film debut casts him as a perpetual college student narrating the raucous odyssey of four university buddies as they make their way from Ithaca, N.Y., to Austin. Their goal: retrieve an illicit video, which was mailed by mistake. Breckin Meyer, Seann William Scott, Amy Smart, Paulo Costanzo, DJ Qualls, Rachel Blanchard. (Repeat).

programme.title: Saving Private Ryan
programme.desc: Steven Spielberg won the Best Director Oscar for this stunning war drama following a squad of U.S. Army soldiers on a mission to rescue a GI trapped behind enemy lines in France on D-Day after all three of the soldier's brothers are killed in action. As the search commences, the close-knit squad sets out through areas still thick with Nazis. (Repeat).

programme.title: Good Will Hunting
programme.desc: Costars and co-writers Matt Damon and Ben Affleck won an Oscar for their tale of a charismatic genius (Damon) who lands in jail after a playground brawl. His hope for the future lies with a sympathetic therapist (Best Supporting Actor Robin Williams), who understands the young man's rebellious nature. Minnie Driver, Stellan Skarsgard, Casey Affleck. (Repeat).

programme.title: Mafia Mamma
programme.desc: The comedy films centers on an American woman with an impossible mission: leading the mafia. After her grandfather passes away, Kristin receives a phone call notifying her that she inherited her grandfather's mafia empire. With the help of a trusted consigliere, Kristin soon discovers her flare for leading the family business. (Repeat).

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc: When his young cousin is inadvertently charged with murder in an Alabama town, an untested Brooklyn lawyer takes on his first case as he attempts to defend two penniless youths in the heart of Dixie, where he clearly does not understand the protocols of the courtroom...or the South. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Italian Job
programme.desc: A breathtakingly paced remake of the 1969 caper film starring Michael Caine, with a gang of thieves out to retake some gold that was stolen from them after they pilfered it from a palazzo in Venice. The film features exciting chase scenes involving Mini Coopers racing through metropolitan Los Angeles. (Repeat).

programme.title: Gladiator
programme.desc: Thrilling action and Russell Crowe's Oscar-winning performance drive 2000's Best Picture, the story of a Roman general who is enslaved and forced to become a gladiator after he clashes with the emperor's bloodthirsty son. (Repeat).

programme.title: Noah
programme.desc: Noah receives a warning from God about a great flood, and constructs an ark to save creation as the planet is cleansed of sin in this stunning Biblical epic. Later, Noah and his family are forced to defend their massive vessel from malicious invaders. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Infiltrator
programme.desc: In this incredible crime drama based on true events, federal agent Robert Mazur goes undercover as a money-laundering businessman in an attempt to bring down Pablo Escobar's Medellín Cartel in the 1980s. (Repeat).

programme.title: Earth Mama
programme.desc: At twenty-four, a pregnant single mother named Gia struggles to keep her family together as she fights the system to reclaim her two kids, Trey and Shaynah, who are stuck in foster care. Resorting to asking her Bay Area community of friends and social workers for help, Gia tries to navigate several obstacles to secure a better life for her unborn child. (Repeat).

programme.title: Pirates
programme.desc: On New Year's Eve 1999, three friends, who are attempting to break into the music scene through pirate radio, drive through London in a desperate search for tickets for the best millennium party ever. (Repeat).

programme.title: After Innocence
programme.desc: Travesty-of-justice chronicle of several wrongly imprisoned men who are set free after DNA evidence exonerates them. (Repeat).

programme.title: Passion Play: Russell Westbrook

programme.title: Breathe
programme.desc: In a dystopian future of oxygen scarcity, Maya and her daughter Zora cling to survival underground. programme.title: The Ladies Man
programme.desc: Tim Meadows gets down and dirty as his Saturday Night Live character Leon Phelps in this raunchy comedy. When the randy late-night disc jockey loses his job, his producer (Karyn Parsons) helps him find work. Leon also must contend with jealous husbands seeking revenge for his romantic attentions to their wives. Billy Dee Williams, Will Ferrell, John Witherspoon. (Repeat).

programme.title: Harlem Nights
programme.desc: In the 1930s two gambling-house proprietors fend off gangster Bugsy Calhoune from muscling into their operation. (Repeat).

programme.title: Hustle & Flow

Jackson, Patrick Malahide, Craig Bierko, David Morse. (Repeat).

programme.title: Out of Darkness

(Repeat).

But when she's told she might lose her hearing again, she escalates her gruesome sound experiments in a quest to compose her masterpiece. (Repeat).

programme.title: Organ Trail

Fight after fight he defied the odds and silenced his critics. And then, guided by faith and devotion, he walked away, choosing his role as a father and a husband over his boxing career. (Repeat).

(Repeat).

Cage plays a crooked cop investigating the assassination of the Secretary of Defense, who was shot at a championship boxing match in Atlantic City. As the investigation proceeds, he is forced to realizes that one of his closest friends (Gary Sinise), a Navy commander, may have been involved. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Yards
programme.desc: After serving time for a crime he didn't commit, Leo Handler makes an effort to get his life back on track. Joining the family business, he unknowingly enters into a world of danger and lawlessness and must decide whether to speak up or remain silent. (Repeat).

programme.title: Naughty Nashville

programme.desc: This electrifying biopic of Brazilian soccer star Pelé recounts his youth in the slums of São Paulo and his rapid ascension to the national team, where, at the age of just 17, he helped lead the squad to their first ever World Cup victory in 1958. (Repeat).

programme.title: McEnroe
programme.desc: The story of a legend told by the legend himself: John McEnroe. Nobody embodied the rockstar era of tennis more than John McEnroe.
