Accompanied by interviews with icons like Patty Smyth, Keith Richards, Billie Jean King, and Bjorn Borg, the legendary tennis ace gives an unflinching account of his triumphs, struggles, friendships, and rivalries. Directed by Kathryn Bigelow. Guy Pearce, Ralph Fiennes. (Repeat).

programme.desc: Deep in the remote wilderness, an unusual and wholly unique family passes their days in relative harmony. The tribe of Sasquatches, though reclusive, creates a thriving community steeped in its own ways as the members navigate love, loss, and hopes for the future. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Contractor
programme.desc: Ex-Marine James Harper takes up arms in a paramilitary unit after his involuntary discharge from the Special Forces leaves him scrambling to make ends meet for his family. On a covert mission abroad, Harper soon finds himself caught in a violent feud, forcing him to find a way home by any means necessary. (Repeat).

programme.title: Save the Last Dance
programme.desc: A suburban ballet student moves to Chicago, where she finds a new way to express herself in the hip-hop culture of her inner-city high school and explore a new romance in this upbeat teen drama. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dream Horse
programme.desc: This comedy film is about Jan Vokes, a Welsh bartender who comes up with the idea of breeding a horse intended for racing. Since she lives in a town that is down on its luck, her neighbors start pitching in and participate in financing for the horse. They see the horse as their chance of redeeming their town and lifting their spirits as it races up the ranks, hopefully to become a champion thoroughbred. Based on a true story. (Repeat).

programme.title: In a Relationship
programme.desc: This romantic comedy satirizes L.A. dating culture by juxtaposing two millennial couples at different relationship stages. Each couple explores different romantic challenges, romantic expectations, and relationship dynamics throughout the summer of 2016. (Repeat).

programme.title: Road Trip
programme.desc: Tom Green's film debut casts him as a perpetual college student narrating the raucous odyssey of four university buddies as they make their way from Ithaca, N.Y., to Austin. Their goal: retrieve an illicit video, which was mailed by mistake. Breckin Meyer, Seann William Scott, Amy Smart, Paulo Costanzo, DJ Qualls, Rachel Blanchard. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Impossible
programme.desc: In this riveting drama, a family vacationing at a beach resort in Thailand desperately search for each other after they are separated by the chaos caused by a tsunami. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Girl in the Pool
programme.desc: Thomas has the ideal life with a good job, a house, and a loving family. All this is threatened when his mistress is found dead in his swimming pool on the same day his family throws a surprise birthday party in the same backyard. As he scrambles to maintain his life as it has been, Thomas soon discovers that he might not be the only one hiding something. (Repeat).

programme.title: Michael Clayton
programme.desc: George Clooney is superb in this intelligent and complex character study of a burned-out "fixer" at a powerful corporate law firm in New York City who faces a crisis of conscience as he comes to grips with his amoral actions. Written and directed by Tony Gilroy. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Peacemaker
programme.desc: A headstrong military man and a scientist go on a frantic search for stolen nuclear warheads before they fall into the wrong hands in this explosive action thriller. (Repeat).

programme.title: Zack and Miri Make a Porno
programme.desc: Writer-director Kevin Smith deftly blends sweet romance with crude, lewd inspired lunacy in this outrageously funny comedy. Seth Rogen and Elizabeth Banks play cash-strapped platonic roommates who try to make it in the adult-movie business in an attempt to get out of debt. A superb ensemble cast of costars features Craig Robinson, Jason Mewes, Justin Long, Ricky Mabe and Jeff Anderson. Former adult-film performers Traci Lords and Katie Morgan also have roles. (Repeat).

programme.title: Get Rich Or Die Tryin'
programme.desc: Saga of a street kid turned drug dealer turned rap artist, loosely based on the life of hip-hop star Calvin "50 Cent" Jackson, who basically plays himself. (Repeat).

programme.title: Cabin Fever
programme.desc: In this chilling remake of the 2002 horror film of the same name, a group of friends head to a remote cabin in the woods for a vacation. However, their fun is soon interrupted by a flesh-eating virus that claims them one-by-one. (Repeat).

programme.title: Clueless
programme.desc: A posh Beverly Hills high school's most popular student does her best to survive the ups and downs of adolescent life. Receiving a foreign exchange student during the school year, she uses her social connections to try to find her a boyfriend. (Repeat).

programme.title: Free Birds
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy for the entire family, two turkeys travel back in time to the first Thanksgiving in order to change the traditional menu and save their kind from being served with a side of cranberry sauce for the holiday. (Repeat).

programme.title: Jules
programme.desc: Jules follows Milton (Kingsley) who lives a quiet life of routine in a small western Pennsylvania town, but finds his day upended when a UFO and its extra-terrestrial passenger crash land in his backyard. Before long, Milton develops a close relationship with the extra-terrestrial he calls "Jules." Things become complicated when two neighbors (Harris and Curtin) discover Jules and the government quickly closes in. (Repeat).

programme.title: Love Story
programme.desc: A high society law student and middle-class musician marry; only to have their whirlwind romance come to a screeching halt when the young woman receives a cancer diagnosis. (Repeat).

programme.title: A Simple Plan
programme.desc: Bill Paxton and Billy Bob Thornton give superb performances in this gripping thriller. The plot revolves around three men who discover a crashed plane containing $4.4 million, and chronicles how their lives unravel after they scheme to steal the loot. Bridget Fonda, Gary Cole, Brent Briscoe, Jack Walsh, Sam Raimi. (Repeat).

programme.title: Ezra
programme.desc: Max Bernal, a struggling stand-up comedian, faces the daunting challenge of co-parenting his autistic son, Ezra, with his ex-wife, Jenna. Living with his father, Max grapples with tough choices regarding Ezra's future. Together, father and son embark on a transformative cross-country journey that bonds them in unexpected ways. What follows is a heartfelt tale of family resilience, humor, and compassion. (Repeat).

programme.title: Treasure
programme.desc: An American journalist decides to travel back to Poland with her Holocaust-surviving father. The goal of their trip was to revisit some of his favorite childhood locations. But an internal resistance to his past trauma proved to be more difficult than originally thought. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Dead Don't Hurt
programme.desc: In the 1860s western frontier, the fiercely independent Vivienne Le Coudy joins her lover Holger Olsen in Elk Flats, Nevada. But the Civil War tears them apart, leaving Vivienne to fight corrupt Mayor Schiller and his ruthless partner. When Holger returns, they must confront their changed selves amidst a landscape of love, betrayal, and the struggle for justice. (Repeat).

programme.title: JFK Revisited: Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: Oliver Stone reassesses John F. Kennedy's assassination 30 years after his first examination of the horrific event that shaped a generation. (Repeat).

programme.title: Seabiscuit
programme.desc: A triumphant Cinderella story about the crowd-pleasing Depression-era thoroughbred Seabiscuit. Together, Seabiscuit's downtrodden jockey, wizened trainer and entrepreneurial owner lead the horse to several victories that helped to inspire a Americans during the downtrodden 1930s. (Repeat).

programme.title: Van Wilder 2: The Rise of Taj
programme.desc: Kal Penn returns as Taj in this outrageous and raunchy sequel to "Van Wilder." This time, the college party animal goes abroad to study in England, where he clashes with snobs and becomes house leader for a group of misfit students. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Dead Don't Hurt
programme.desc: In the 1860s western frontier, the fiercely independent Vivienne Le Coudy joins her lover Holger Olsen in Elk Flats, Nevada. But the Civil War tears them apart, leaving Vivienne to fight corrupt Mayor Schiller and his ruthless partner. When Holger returns, they must confront their changed selves amidst a landscape of love, betrayal, and the struggle for justice. (Repeat).

programme.title: Club C. Presents a Queer Comedy Extravaganza!
programme.desc: Emmy nominee and Tony winner Alan C. hosts this cabaret-style gathering featuring seven up-and-coming queer comedians that represent not only the diversity of the queer spectrum, but also of comedy styling, from stand-up to characters to musical performances. The 75-minute special features Joe Castle Baker, Julia Shiplett, duo Zach Teague & Drew Lausch, Nori Reed, Pat Regan, and Larry Owens. (Repeat).

programme.title: Seabiscuit
programme.desc: A triumphant Cinderella story about the crowd-pleasing Depression-era thoroughbred Seabiscuit. Together, Seabiscuit's downtrodden jockey, wizened trainer and entrepreneurial owner lead the horse to several victories that helped to inspire a Americans during the downtrodden 1930s. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Face of Love
programme.desc: A widow falls for a man who looks like her late husband, and tries to continue her previous marriage. Meanwhile, her new beau must unravel the mystery of her tragic past in this heartfelt romantic drama. (Repeat).

programme.title: Prospect
programme.desc: A teenage girl and her father travel to a remote alien moon, aiming to strike it rich. They've secured a contract to harvest a large deposit of the elusive gems hidden in the depths of the moon's toxic forest. But there are others roving the wilderness and the job quickly devolves into a fight to survive. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Painter
programme.desc: Peter, an ex-CIA operative, reluctantly finds himself face-to-face with the past he tried to run from when he unexpectedly encounters an enigmatic young woman from his past. As he and the woman suddenly find themselves the target of both a ruthless assassin and a paramilitary black ops force, he easily taps back into the training that he thought he had forgotten for good. (Repeat).

programme.title: Casino Royale
programme.desc: Daniel Craig kills in his first outing as British secret agent James Bond. In this gripping and ripping adaptation of Ian Fleming's first 007 adventure, Bond tries to turn the tables on a terrorist banker, whom he's engaged in a high-stakes poker game. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Stepfather
programme.desc: When Michael Harding returns home from military school, he clashes with his new stepfather in this intense thriller. Michael begins to suspect that his mom's new husband might be a notorious serial killer who preys on broken families. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dead Shot
programme.desc: When a retired military man witnesses a Special Air Service soldier murder his wife, he flees to the forest and is presumed dead. As time passes, he heals and formulates a plan to get his revenge. He must navigate some well-equipped military personnel as he takes his fight to the dark streets of London. (Repeat).

programme.title: Super 8
programme.desc: Kyle Chandler stars in this riveting sci-fi adventure set in a small Ohio town during the summer of 1979. A group of kids witness a train being derailed while filming an amateur movie, and soon an otherworldly force begins to stalk their town as people mysteriously disappear. Directed by J.J. Abrams and produced by Steven Spielberg. (Repeat).

programme.title: Casino Royale
programme.desc: Daniel Craig kills in his first outing as British secret agent James Bond. In this gripping and ripping adaptation of Ian Fleming's first 007 adventure, Bond tries to turn the tables on a terrorist banker, whom he's engaged in a high-stakes poker game. (Repeat).

programme.title: Goodfellas
programme.desc: Gangster saga explores the life of organized crime as it chronicles the true-life rise and fall of New York mobster and FBI informant Henry Hill and the more prominent "goodfellas" in his world. Henry comes up through the ranks, but quickly learns that his half-Irish, half-Sicilian ethnicity prevents him from ever becoming a "made guy." Soon he finds himself the target of both the feds and his Mafia family, who feel that he has become a threat to their security with his reckless dealings. (Repeat).

programme.title: Top Five
programme.desc: A comedian-turned-movie star spends time with a journalist who's writing a profile on him, just as his latest film is getting terrible reviews. Along the way, he is forced to reflect on his past, his career mistakes and his upcoming marriage to a reality-TV starlet. (Repeat).

programme.title: Parallel
programme.desc: While grappling with her seemingly insurmountable grief, a young woman named Vanessa embarks on a retreat in search of some solace. However, she soon discovers that the lines between different realities have begun to blur, and she finds herself caught in the crossfire. (Repeat).

programme.title: 6 Days
programme.desc: In 1980, six gunmen storm the Iranian Embassy in London and take 26 hostages. While a police negotiator tries to prevent further violence, SAS teams plan for a raid in this tense, gripping drama based on real events. (Repeat).

programme.title: Identity
programme.desc: John Cusack leads a terrific ensemble cast in this plot-twisting, Agatha Christie-style whodunit about a group of strangers stranded overnight in an isolated Nevada motel who slowly realize they are being killed off one by one. (Repeat).

programme.title: Paddington
programme.desc: After his home in Peru is destroyed, a talking bear named Paddington travels to London, where he is taken in by a kindly family. However, a museum taxidermist is determined to make a trophy out of him in this endearing adventure for all ages. (Repeat).

programme.title: Monstrous
programme.desc: Laura, the mother to seven-year-old Cody, decides to get a new but isolated house near a lake. They are trying to live a new life after escaping Laura's abusive ex-husband. Amidst the appeal of their life and surroundings, a new challenge appears in the form of a monstrous being that emerges from the waters near their property, haunting them in more ways than one. (Repeat).

programme.title: Sasquatch Sunset
programme.desc: Deep in the remote wilderness, an unusual and wholly unique family passes their days in relative harmony. The tribe of Sasquatches, though reclusive, creates a thriving community steeped in its own ways as the members navigate love, loss, and hopes for the future. (Repeat).

programme.title: Michael Clayton
programme.desc: George Clooney is superb in this intelligent and complex character study of a burned-out "fixer" at a powerful corporate law firm in New York City who faces a crisis of conscience as he comes to grips with his amoral actions. Written and directed by Tony Gilroy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Unforgiven
programme.desc: In this thrilling and provocative revisionist Western, a former gunslinger-turned-farmer agrees to help hunt down two cowboys who assaulted and disfigured a prostitute. However, his quest brings him into conflict with an authoritarian sheriff. (Repeat).

programme.title: Forrest Gump
programme.desc: Six Oscars, including Best Picture and Actor (Tom Hanks), went to this extraordinary tale of a simple man who unwittingly becomes involved in some of the key moments of the 20th century. Meanwhile, as the remarkable parade of his life goes by, Forrest never forgets Jenny, the girl he loved as a boy, who makes her own journey through the turbulence of the 1960s and '70s that is far more troubled than the path Forrest happens upon. (Repeat).

programme.title: Two for the Money
programme.desc: Matthew McConaughey and Al Pacino bring their "A" games in this winning profile of a pair of high-profile, high-stakes sports handicappers. The former is an ex-college quarterback with a knack for covering the lines and the latter plays his wily mentor. The film, based on a true story, is directed by D.J. Caruso, and features an outstanding costarring turn by Rene Russo as Pacino's troubled wife. Russo also serves as one of the executive producers. Armand Assante, Jeremy Piven, Jaime King. (Repeat).

programme.title: School Ties
programme.desc: A promising football player who wins a scholarship to a 1950s prep school must conceal his religion from his teammates and friends. (Repeat).

programme.title: Imagine That
programme.desc: This winning family film stars Eddie Murphy as an ambitious financial whiz who sacrifices time with his 7-year-old daughter (Yara Shahidi) for the sake of his job. One day his daughter's imaginary world unexpectedly helps his career, prompting him to improve their strained relationship. Directed by Karey Kirkpatrick. Thomas Haden Church, Ronny Cox, Martin Sheen. (Repeat).

programme.title: Love Story
programme.desc: A high society law student and middle-class musician marry; only to have their whirlwind romance come to a screeching halt when the young woman receives a cancer diagnosis. (Repeat).

programme.title: Finding Vivian Maier
programme.desc: This documentary examines the art and life of Vivian Maier, a nanny whose secret collection of more than 100,000 photographs were discovered and eventually came to be considered one of the most definitive photographic works of the 20th century. (Repeat).

programme.title: Pelé: Birth of a Legend
programme.desc: This electrifying biopic of Brazilian soccer star Pelé recounts his youth in the slums of São Paulo and his rapid ascension to the national team, where, at the age of just 17, he helped lead the squad to their first ever World Cup victory in 1958. (Repeat).

programme.title: Bad News Bears
programme.desc: A cynical, hard-drinking ex-baseball player (Billy Bob Thornton) grudgingly coaches an inept Little League team in this hit-and-miss remake of the 1976 classic. Greg Kinnear, Marcia Gay Harden. Directed by Richard Linklater ("School of Rock"). (Repeat).

programme.title: The Perfect Game
programme.desc: Buy some peanuts, Cracker Jack and tissues for this warmhearted sports saga based on the true story of a ragtag baseball team from Monterrey, Mexico, that became the first non-U.S. squad to win the Little League World Series in 1957. Clifton Collins Jr., Cheech Marin, Louis Gossett Jr., Bruce McGill, David Koechner. Directed by William Dear. Screenwriter W. William Winokur adapted his book of the same name. (Repeat).

programme.title: Walkaway Joe
programme.desc: Teen billiard whiz Dallas looks up to his dad, Cal, as they share a love for playing billiards. But when Cal leaves their family, Dallas can't stand the absence of his father. He travels to different pool halls across the country in search of his father, until he encounters a wandering loner who tries to help him and gives him a few life lessons of his own. (Repeat).

programme.title: Our Ghosts
programme.desc: Evicted from their apartment, a father and son try to scare new tenants. (Repeat).

programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: A charlatan claiming to be a faith healer is stranded in a backwater town in Kansas where a local sheriff gets wise to his scam. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Baby-Sitters Club
programme.desc: Adaptation culled from the popular book series about seven enterprising adolescents who find their moneymaking efforts hampered by boys, neighbors and parents. Schuyler Fisk, Rachael Leigh Cook. Stacey: Bre Blair. Dawn: Larisa Oleynik. Claudia: Tricia Joe. Melanie Mayron directed. (Repeat).

programme.title: Bad News Bears
programme.desc: A cynical, hard-drinking ex-baseball player (Billy Bob Thornton) grudgingly coaches an inept Little League team in this hit-and-miss remake of the 1976 classic. Greg Kinnear, Marcia Gay Harden. Directed by Richard Linklater ("School of Rock"). (Repeat).

programme.title: Hoop Dreams
programme.desc: Inspirational documentary that follows two high-school basketball players over four years as they set their sights on college scholarships and a chance to play in the NBA. (Repeat).

programme.title: Downhill Racer
programme.desc: Robert Redford as an egotist skiing with the U.S. team in Europe. Fine skiing footage; filmed on location. Gene Hackman, Camilla Sparv, Jim McMullan. D.K.: Kenneth Kirk. Mayo: Dabney Coleman. Machet: Karl Michael Vogler. Tommy: Joe Jay Albert. Directed by Michael Ritchie. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Perfect Game
programme.desc: Buy some peanuts, Cracker Jack and tissues for this warmhearted sports saga based on the true story of a ragtag baseball team from Monterrey, Mexico, that became the first non-U.S. squad to win the Little League World Series in 1957. Clifton Collins Jr., Cheech Marin, Louis Gossett Jr., Bruce McGill, David Koechner. Directed by William Dear. Screenwriter W. William Winokur adapted his book of the same name. (Repeat).

programme.title: Just My Luck
programme.desc: Sizzling star Lindsay Lohan sparkles in this romantic comedy about a lucky career gal whose good fortunes are inexplicably reversed after she kisses the unluckiest guy in town at a masked ball. Chris Pine, Faizon Love, Missi Pyle. Directed by Donald Petrie. (Repeat).

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: During the Civil War, the four daughters of a doctor who went to the front patiently wait for his return to their mother. Jo, Amy, Beth and Meg March try to compensate for their father's absence and lack of resources by continuing their creative activities and helping others. As we grow up, they all take a different path. Jo, who wants to become a writer, dreams of moving to New York. (Repeat).

programme.title: My Fair Lady
programme.desc: This Best Picture, a musical reworking of George Bernard Shaw's "Pygmalion," is about a pompous, acid-tongued professor of linguistics (Best Actor Rex Harrison) who tries to refine an ill-mannered, uneducated guttersnipe and pass her off as a princess in six months. The film won a total of eight Oscars. (Repeat).

In small-town Illinois, aspiring filmmaker Pat Johnson contends with the pitfalls of adolescence, from bullying to young love. However, when he discovers a new science fiction film, he may find himself at the center of events much greater than himself. Based on true events. (Repeat).

programme.title: Warrior Strong
programme.desc: To save the career he endangered with his hotheaded attitude, professional basketball player Bilal Irving takes on a new job - coaching the failing basketball team in his hometown of Dumont, Ontario. He's got just one obstacle: his former coach, whose ideas about coaching vastly differ from that of Bilal's. The two will have to put aside their differences and their attitudes if this small-town team is to have any chance at winning. (Repeat).

programme.title: Coneheads
programme.desc: Dan Aykroyd and Jane Curtin reprise their "Saturday Night Live" roles as an alien couple who settle in New Jersey. The story concerns Beldar and Prymaat, who leave the planet Remulak to prepare for an invasion of Earth. But due to a malfunction, they find themselves plunged into the Hudson River and forced to take up residence in Paramus, N.J. (Repeat).

programme.title: Mistletoe Ranch
programme.desc: Up-and-coming photographer Aimée strives to make it in the photography world. She finds herself squandering her talents as her demanding boss's assistant. A letter from her estranged family suddenly brings Aimée back to her rural childhood home, where she encounters more than she had ever hoped to expect amidst the holiday season. (Repeat).

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: During the Civil War, the four daughters of a doctor who went to the front patiently wait for his return to their mother. Jo, Amy, Beth and Meg March try to compensate for their father's absence and lack of resources by continuing their creative activities and helping others. As we grow up, they all take a different path. Jo, who wants to become a writer, dreams of moving to New York. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Age of Adaline
programme.desc: A beautiful woman stops aging after a car accident, and remains 29 for several decades in this intriguing fantasy. She refuses to get close to anyone in order to keep her condition a secret, but reconsiders her solitary lifestyle after falling in love with a philanthropist. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Face of Love
programme.desc: A widow falls for a man who looks like her late husband, and tries to continue her previous marriage. Meanwhile, her new beau must unravel the mystery of her tragic past in this heartfelt romantic drama. (Repeat).

programme.title: Poppy
programme.desc: Nineteen-year-old Poppy Simpson refuses to be defined by Down syndrome and is determined to take charge of her own life. (Repeat).

programme.title: Close
programme.desc: Two thirteen year-olds have always been incredibly close but they drift apart after the intimacy of their relationship is questioned by schoolmates. An emotionally transformative and unforgettable portrait of the intersection of friendship and love, identity and independence, and heartbreak and healing. (Repeat).

programme.desc: Up-and-coming photographer Aimée strives to make it in the photography world. She finds herself squandering her talents as her demanding boss's assistant. A letter from her estranged family suddenly brings Aimée back to her rural childhood home, where she encounters more than she had ever hoped to expect amidst the holiday season. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Absorbing biopic of renowned Indian mathematician Srinivasa Ramanujan, who travels to England in 1913 to study at Cambridge. He faces prejudice there from many of his colleagues, but he also bonds with a professor named G.H. Hardy. In time, Ramanujan authors a number of pioneering equations. (Repeat).

programme.title: Sabrina
programme.desc: Remake of Billy Wilder's 1954 gem about the transformation of a woman and the two brothers vying for her attention. (Repeat).

programme.title: Clue
programme.desc: The whodunit board game comes to life as guests are invited to a swanky mansion to learn who is blackmailing them. (Repeat).

programme.title: Walkaway Joe
programme.desc: Teen billiard whiz Dallas looks up to his dad, Cal, as they share a love for playing billiards. But when Cal leaves their family, Dallas can't stand the absence of his father. He travels to different pool halls across the country in search of his father, until he encounters a wandering loner who tries to help him and gives him a few life lessons of his own. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: As the Gestapo escalates their crimes against humanity across Eastern Europe, individuals of minorities and Jewish descent increasingly fear for their lives. Skilled forger Cioma Schönhaus, a young Jewish man, begins crafting fake passports for the members of his community to help shepherd them to safety. Yet his counterfeiting abilities do not stop at documents as he carefully crafts a new identity to take down the enemy from the inside. Based on true events. (Repeat).

programme.title: A Wonderful Time of the Year
programme.desc: The Marsh family is getting together for their first Christmas Eve after three years of pandemic lockdown. (Repeat).

programme.title: Scrapper
programme.desc: Living alone since her beloved mum died, 12-year-old Georgie fills the flat they shared with her own special magic. But when her absent father Jason turns up out of the blue, she's forced to confront reality. (Repeat).

programme.title: Santa Stole Our Dog
programme.desc: A family wake up on Christmas Day to find that their dog is missing. It's soon confirmed via a DNA test that Santa really does exist, so they begin a quest to get to the North Pole and reunite with the beloved pet. (Repeat).

programme.title: Nine Lives
programme.desc: A businessman buys a cat as a gift for his daughter's birthday, only to have his mind transported into the feline's body following a car accident. As his family's new pet, he begins to see his loved ones in a different light in this delightful comedy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Jules
programme.desc: Jules follows Milton (Kingsley) who lives a quiet life of routine in a small western Pennsylvania town, but finds his day upended when a UFO and its extra-terrestrial passenger crash land in his backyard. Before long, Milton develops a close relationship with the extra-terrestrial he calls "Jules." Things become complicated when two neighbors (Harris and Curtin) discover Jules and the government quickly closes in. (Repeat).

programme.title: A Wonderful Time of the Year
programme.desc: The Marsh family is getting together for their first Christmas Eve after three years of pandemic lockdown. (Repeat).

programme.title: Past Lives
programme.desc: Growing up in a small South Korean town, Hae Sung and Nora shared a deep, inextricable bond that was suddenly torn asunder by Nora's family's emigration to the United States. Twenty years later, the childhood sweethearts inexplicably cross paths and share one emotionally-charged week that forces them to confront long-dormant feelings and their hopes for the future. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Moon and Back
programme.desc: Isabel May stars in this comedy as a high school student stumbling through her senior year, until she discovers her dad's unfinished screenplay and makes his crazy dream her reality. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Honeymooners
programme.desc: Big-screen take on the classic sitcom about a blustery, big-scheming New York City bus driver and his sewer-worker pal. (Repeat).

programme.title: Deck the Halls
programme.desc: In this uproarious holiday farce, an uptight optometrist hits the roof when his neighbor decides to decorate his house with enough Christmas lights to be seen from space. (Repeat).

programme.title: Bad News Bears
programme.desc: A cynical, hard-drinking ex-baseball player (Billy Bob Thornton) grudgingly coaches an inept Little League team in this hit-and-miss remake of the 1976 classic. Greg Kinnear, Marcia Gay Harden. Directed by Richard Linklater ("School of Rock"). (Repeat).

programme.title: Yours, Mine & Ours
programme.desc: A widower with eight kids marries a widow who has 10 of her own in this remake of the 1968 family movie. (Repeat).

programme.title: Mistletoe Ranch
programme.desc: Up-and-coming photographer Aimée strives to make it in the photography world. She finds herself squandering her talents as her demanding boss's assistant. A letter from her estranged family suddenly brings Aimée back to her rural childhood home, where she encounters more than she had ever hoped to expect amidst the holiday season. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Christmas Classic
programme.desc: This holiday movie follows Elizabeth, a transplanted "city girl" type of career woman who returns to her hometown to buy a ski resort owned by her ex, Randy. She works for her fiancé's father, so Elizabeth wants to clinch the sale at his behest. Randy objects to being bought outright but proposes an alternative. If Elizabeth could win their town's annual Christmas-related competitions, he'd sell his property. The problem is, she needs to beat the long-running champion: her perfectionist sister. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Brady Bunch Movie
programme.desc: A send-up of the TV series, it's the story of a lovely lady, a man named Brady, and their kids, whose wholesome '70s natures clashes with the grungy '90s. (Repeat).

programme.title: All the Money in the World
programme.desc: Thrilling dramatization of the 1973 kidnapping of John Paul Getty III, the grandson of billionaire J. Paul Getty. John's mother Gail begs Getty to pay the ransom; when he refuses, she decides to rescue her son with the help of Getty's business associate, an ex-CIA agent named Fletcher Chase. Inspired by historical events. Certain scenes, characters and dialogue have been fictionalized for dramatic purposes.

programme.title: She Said
programme.desc: New York Times reporters Jodi Kantor and Megan Twohey try to piece together the details of one of the most controversial stories in recent history, one that would help launch the #MeToo movement. Their objective is to find out the truth about the sexual harassment allegations against Hollywood heavyweight Harvey Weinstein. et they face the obstacle of no female survivors of the incidents seem to want to go on the record to corroborate their story.

programme.title: Of an Age
programme.desc: Kol, a Serbian dancer, goes to help his dance partner Ebony and comes away with much more. When Ebony wakes up on a beach with no recollection of how she got there, Kol rushes to her side. In the process, he meets Adam, Ebony's older brother. The two have a 24-hour romance, ending when Adam has to leave. But their brief relationship means so much to both of them that neither distance nor the future can keep them apart.

programme.title: Rock the Kasbah
programme.desc: In this fish-out-of-water comedy, a grizzled rock manager is stranded in Afghanistan when his client skips town with his passport. He soon discovers a dulcet-voiced Afghani woman, and helps her enter a televised singing competition.

programme.title: The Show
programme.desc: A TV network desperate for ratings launches a reality show on which people who are considering suicide are offered the chance to do it live on-air. A struggling janitor signs up, hoping to help his family survive.

programme.title: She Said
programme.desc: New York Times reporters Jodi Kantor and Megan Twohey try to piece together the details of one of the most controversial stories in recent history, one that would help launch the #MeToo movement. Their objective is to find out the truth about the sexual harassment allegations against Hollywood heavyweight Harvey Weinstein. et they face the obstacle of no female survivors of the incidents seem to want to go on the record to corroborate their story.

programme.title: Why Men are Clueless
programme.desc: After three years of dating, Omar still has no idea how to keep his girlfriend Diane happy. Instead of showing up for a make-up date, he goes to a meeting for a once-in-a-lifetime job as a writer. She splits with him, and now he has to figure out how she ticks. Worse, his dream job is predicated on him figuring out how all women tick, and his only resources are other clueless men.

programme.title: Cocaine Bear
programme.desc: In Georgia, an unlikely band of police officers, criminals, tourists, and teenagers find themselves thrust into a situation of life or death when an unnaturally large black bear suddenly rampages through the forest after consuming cocaine. The humans must then outlast the creature or face fatal consequences.

programme.title: Retribution
programme.desc: With his kids trapped in the back seat and a bomb that will explode if they get out of the car, a normal commute becomes a twisted game of life or death as Matt Turner follows a stranger's increasingly dangerous instructions in a race against time to save his family.

programme.title: Fat Joe Talks
programme.desc: Welcome to the Trap! Where hip-hop mogul, actor, and entrepreneur T.I. explains building wealth through multiple business ventures, the importance of family, and his new love of comedy. (Repeat).

programme.title: A Thousand and One
programme.desc: The foster care system can be punishing for children, especially when they are living in a hostile situation. Inez commits a necessary crime and kidnaps a six-year-old boy named Terry. The new mother and son duo now live in New York City, and Inez needs to protect her child at all costs. (New).

programme.title: Fat Joe Talks
programme.desc: Welcome to the Trap! Where hip-hop mogul, actor, and entrepreneur T.I. explains building wealth through multiple business ventures, the importance of family, and his new love of comedy. (Repeat).

programme.title: Cocaine Bear
programme.desc: In Georgia, an unlikely band of police officers, criminals, tourists, and teenagers find themselves thrust into a situation of life or death when an unnaturally large black bear suddenly rampages through the forest after consuming cocaine. The humans must then outlast the creature or face fatal consequences.

programme.title: The Girl in the Spider's Web
programme.desc: After being enlisted to recover a dangerous computer program, hacker Lisbeth Salander and journalist Mikael Blomkvist find themselves caught in a web of spies, cybercriminals and corrupt government officials.

programme.title: Man Down
programme.desc: In this piercing psychological thriller, a U.S. marine named Gabriel Drummer returns home from Afghanistan and begins a search for his estranged wife and son. With the help of his best friend and fellow soldier Devin, he finds a drifter who has information about his family's whereabouts. Meanwhile, flashbacks to his time in Afghanistan help piece together the full details of Drummer's life.

programme.title: Clawfoot
programme.desc: This drama-thriller follows Janet, an upper-class housewife whose husband suddenly leaves without a trace. After his disappearance, a handsome contractor appears at their suburban home to remodel their bathroom. Since the contract bears her husband's signature, Janet lets him in, not knowing the psychological games he'll play with her until the tables are curiously turned.

programme.title: Ecco
programme.desc: A retired hitman trying to forget his dark past and live a normal and peaceful life with his new wife and their unborn son is forced to use his lethal skills again to protect his young family. Hunted by his past employers who seek to bury him to keep their past crimes hidden, Michael decided to fight back for the sake of his loved ones.

programme.title: Flatliners
programme.desc: Eager to find out what the afterlife is like, five medical students seek out near-death experiences by stopping their hearts for a brief period of time. However, their visions of the great beyond turn nightmarish in this engaging sci-fi-thriller.

programme.title: A Thousand and One
programme.desc: The foster care system can be punishing for children, especially when they are living in a hostile situation. Inez commits a necessary crime and kidnaps a six-year-old boy named Terry. The new mother and son duo now live in New York City, and Inez needs to protect her child at all costs.

programme.title: HIGH School
programme.desc: After breaking his school's zero-tolerance drug policy, a valedictorian and his stoner buddy steal the local dealer's stash and taint the entire school bake sale to make everyone guilty of the same crime in this rollicking comedy.

programme.title: The Ministry of Ungentlemanly Warfare
programme.desc: This spy action-comedy film portrays a fictionalized version of a British intelligence organization called Special Operations Executive. During World War II, the team's main goal is to sabotage efforts by Nazi Germany by conducting and facilitating espionage missions. The group is touted as the forerunner of contemporary military black operations. The force is composed of select military officials and rogues of improper behavior who utilize unconventional tactics.

programme.title: Inside
programme.desc: When an art thief gets trapped inside a luxurious penthouse apartment, he struggles to survive and maintain his mental sanity as days go by and the wealth that surrounds him becomes irrelevant.

programme.title: A Thousand and One
programme.desc: The foster care system can be punishing for children, especially when they are living in a hostile situation. Inez commits a necessary crime and kidnaps a six-year-old boy named Terry. The new mother and son duo now live in New York City, and Inez needs to protect her child at all costs.

programme.title: Easter Sunday
programme.desc: A man returns home for an Easter celebration with his riotous, bickering, eating, drinking, laughing, loving family, in this love letter to the Filipino-American community.

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Jamie braces himself for battle against British forces. Buck MacKenzie's intentions in the twentieth century are called into question by Roger and Brianna. William is a participant in the First Battle of Saratoga. (Repeat).

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: Jamie fights in the pivotal Second Battle of Saratoga. Roger and Brianna search for Jemmy. (Repeat).

programme.title: The Ministry of Ungentlemanly Warfare
programme.desc: This spy action-comedy film portrays a fictionalized version of a British intelligence organization called Special Operations Executive. During World War II, the team's main goal is to sabotage efforts by Nazi Germany by conducting and facilitating espionage missions. The group is touted as the forerunner of contemporary military black operations. The force is composed of select military officials and rogues of improper behavior who utilize unconventional tactics.

programme.title: She Said
programme.desc: New York Times reporters Jodi Kantor and Megan Twohey try to piece together the details of one of the most controversial stories in recent history, one that would help launch the #MeToo movement. Their objective is to find out the truth about the sexual harassment allegations against Hollywood heavyweight Harvey Weinstein. et they face the obstacle of no female survivors of the incidents seem to want to go on the record to corroborate their story.

programme.title: Hangman
programme.desc: In this terrifying crime thriller, a veteran homicide detective and his younger partner probe a chain of murders committed by a serial killer, who leaves behind clues related to the children's game Hangman. The case eventually reveals a connection between the culprit and the older cop.

programme.title: Monster Hunter
programme.desc: After Lieutenant Artemis and her team of elite soldiers go through a portal and get transported to a different dimension, they are faced with a threat they have never encountered before: huge, powerful monsters. In the middle of the chaos, however, they meet The Hunter, a mysterious warrior whose impressive skills have allowed him to last in the new, hostile land. Together, they team up to secure their survival and find a way home.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Afterlife
programme.desc: Single mother Callie seeks a fresh start with her two children, moving her family to a rural midwestern town. Yet they soon experience a host of supernatural circumstances, unveiling a strange connection to the children's eccentric grandfather. Based on the 1984 cult classic film.

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: In this thrilling and hilarious reboot of the beloved sci-fi-comedy franchise, two paranormal researchers join forces with a nuclear engineer and a subway attendant to fight off a slew of ghosts that have invaded New York City. Eventually, they come face-to-face with an evil entity who can control human beings.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
programme.desc: This thrilling second installment of the popular "Twilight" saga finds Bella Swan in pieces after her vampire boyfriend leaves town. She soon reconnects with a childhood friend and realizes he's hiding a dark secret that may hold the key to her survival. Extended version.

programme.title: Spoiler Alert
programme.desc: The narrative tells the true story of Michael Ausiello and Kit Cowan. The young couple is in love and ready to spend the rest of their lives together. When Kit is diagnosed with terminal cancer, the couple's future is thwarted in unexpected ways. What follows is a tale portraying the power to rise above every obstacle in the face of love.

programme.title: M3GAN
programme.desc: A brilliant toy company roboticist uses artificial intelligence to develop M3GAN, a life-like doll programmed to emotionally bond with her newly orphaned niece. But when the doll's programming works too well, she becomes overprotective of her new friend with terrifying results.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1
programme.desc: In this magical installment of the "Twilight" saga, Bella becomes pregnant after marrying Edward, which leads to a dangerous childbirth and a shocking realization for werewolf Jacob Black.

programme.title: Hot Fuzz
programme.desc: Director-writer Edgar Wright, writer-star Simon Pegg and costar Nick Frost, the U.K. trio behind the frighteningly silly but bloody hilarious "Shaun of the Dead," reunite for this smashingly entertaining cop-buddy joyride. Pegg is a big-city superofficer who gets teamed with Frost's small-town booby bobby to fight crime in the quaint old town of Sandford, where things are not as calm as they seem. Features cameos by Cate Blanchett, Timothy Dalton and director Peter Jackson.

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: Yuks and yucks collide in this uproarious British comedy, a seamless blend of wit and horror. Simon Pegg stars as a beer-swilling slacker who tries to get his miserable life in order while repelling the zombies that have overrun London. Pegg also co-wrote the script with director Edgar Wright. Kate Ashfield, Nick Frost, Lucy Davis, Bill Nighy, Martin Freeman.

programme.title: Paul
programme.desc: In this wildly funny road-trip comedy, sci-fi geeks Graeme (Simon Pegg) and Clive (Nick Frost) pick up an extraterrestrial hitchhiker named Paul and help him get back to his mother ship, while the FBI closes in on them. Directed by Greg Mottola.

programme.title: Naked Singularity
programme.desc: In New York City, public defense lawyer Casi feels his utopian ideals falter amidst the city's corrupt justice system. Facing disbarment and disillusioned with society at large, Casi concocts an outlandish heist to rob his wealthy drug lord client. Based on the novel by Sergio De La Pava.

programme.title: Oz the Great and Powerful
programme.desc: In this dazzling fantasy adventure, shady Kansas magician Oscar Diggs is mysteriously transported to the magical land of Oz, where he encounters three powerful witches and is tasked with rooting out an evil force that threatens the entire kingdom.

programme.title: Manodrome
programme.desc: This drama follows Ralphie, a man wrestling with many insecurities. Having recently lost his job as an Uber driver, he desperately tries to make ends meet since his girlfriend is pregnant. He encounters a group of men who seems to have it all together. Ralphie is attracted to this all-male family setup, even if there are displays and tenets of toxic masculinity hovering around them. As he becomes a member of this family, the toxicity soon affects his life and his relationship.

programme.title: Ordinary Angels
programme.desc: Widower Ed Schmitt is taking care of a sick three-year-old daughter. She desperately needs a liver transplant, a medical and financial feat that Ed must face and overcome for his daughter to survive. Hairdresser Sharon Stevens steps in to help facilitate funds and logistics to help the father-daughter tandem. However, they will soon face a catastrophic snowstorm, a larger enemy that blocks their way.

programme.title: Oz the Great and Powerful

programme.title: Imaginary
programme.desc: This supernatural horror film follows Jessica, a woman who returns to live in her childhood house with her husband and stepdaughter Alice. The girl finds Jessica's childhood teddy bear named Chauncey, and she encourages the child to treat Chauncey as an imaginary friend. However, when sinister things start happening as Alice also behaves badly, Jessica suspects there's more than meets the eye with Chauncey.

programme.title: The Strangers: Chapter 1
programme.desc: While on holiday, a young couple's car suddenly breaks down in an insular rural community, so they take refuge in a remote cabin awaiting repairs. Yet when a trio of masked strangers begins lurking outside the cabin, the couple quickly realizes that not all is as it seems in this town.

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper: Pop Ups
programme.sub-title: Pop Ups: Leave It to Nevus
programme.desc: All new juicy pop-up facts and behind-the-scenes secrets finally revealed. Dr. Lee reopens her office with new safety protocols. Monica has a large facial birthmark. Jackie has a melon-sized shoulder lump. Reginald has large, rare growths on his head. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper: Pop Ups
programme.sub-title: Pop Ups: Big Pop on Campus
programme.desc: All new juicy pop-up facts and behind-the-scenes secrets finally revealed. Dr. Lee works to remove the large rare growths on the back of Reginald's head. Che'Re has a prominent bump on her face. Juan has several painful boils on the back of his neck. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper
programme.desc: Pop-up facts and behind-the-scenes secrets revealed. Dennis has giant growths on his head. Juan has a rare condition he hopes Dr. Lee will understand. Natalie needs answers as to why her body is covered in mysterious dark bumps. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper: Pop Ups
programme.desc: Behind-the scenes and pop-up facts are revealed.Audrey pops the painful bumps that cover her body. Felicia has a dark growth on her forehead. Krista sweats so much that she could fill an entire milk jug every day with her sweat. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper: Pop Ups
programme.sub-title: Pop Ups: Pain in the Neck
programme.desc: Pop-up facts and behind-the-scenes secrets are revealed. John fears the lump on his neck may suffocate him. Shoshana's forehead growth depresses her. Ashley hopes Dr. Lee can provide some relief from her three painful skin conditions. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper: Pop Ups
programme.desc: Pop-up facts and behind-the-scenes secrets revealed. Yaellie has itchy psoriasis all over her body. Former Marine Matt has a large recurring lump in his armpit. Twins Tracie and Stacie have matching bumps on their heads. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper
programme.desc: Joanne's forehead growth has held her back, and Mike has a soft head bump. (Repeat).

programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper: Pop Ups
programme.desc: Pop-up facts and behind-the-scenes secrets are revealed. JD has a pear-shaped ear mass. David has two painful bumps on his neck and one on his finger. Former cruise ship worker Julie hopes Dr. Lee can remove her large back growth. (Repeat).
